Use keys to focus the reward pool on higher reward tiers for a single draw from a mystery box. Non-common keys are consumed after using them to open a box. Every time you open a mystery box you gain progress on a random key pay out.

Mystery boxes can be won in events, purchased at traders or obtained through special offers. They are available in different rarities. The better the rarity of the box, the better your potential reward! A lot of luck is needed to draw the best reward from a mystery box. Use a key to draw one of the high tier rewards from a single box opening. Non-common keys are consumed after using them to open a box. Every time you open a mystery box you gain progress on a random key pay out.

Select one or more castle wall sections to attack and choose which soldiers and siege tools you want to use for each section. You can place the soldiers and tools in the slots yourself, or you can choose the autofill option to have the current attack wave filled for you automatically.
Autofill uses the espionage report about your target to determine how to best fill the attack wave. The more accurate the report is, the better your warriors and tools will be positioned to defeat the enemy. If there is no espionage report, a balance of units and tools will be chosen. Autofill will always try to achieve the highest possible attack power so that you suffer as few losses as possible. The number of tools used and how they are distributed will be determined according to the defensive bonuses from the defender's castle gate and castle wall. Autofill takes into consideration your commander's equipment effects as well.
Please keep in mind that bonuses that affect travel speed are not effective during capture attacks.
An automatically filled attack wave can be changed at any time by adding or removing units or tools manually.
When attack support tools have been unlocked, they can be used to add additional effects to an attack. Support tools always apply to the entire battle, not a specific front/flank or wave of the attack.

Here you can manage your generals. Select a general from the list to the left to interact with them.
For unlocked generals, you can review their skills, abilities, and effects. Access the skill tree and ability overview to manage and modify a general's skills and abilities. You can also increase the level and star rating of a general.
A general can be assigned to a commander or castellan in order to participate in battles with the commander/castellan. The general's skills and effects are added to the battle. Make sure to select abilities appropriate for your needs in the upcoming battle.

Here you can select the abilities for your general. Abilities will significatly improve the combat power of a general and their army. Abilities will be triggered during a certain phase of battle, granting powerful effects to the general's army and troops. Select an ability on the left side to assign it to an ability slot to the right. Only abilties assigned to slots will be active in battle! Make sure to save any changes before closing the abilities menu!
You can unlock more ability slots in your skill tree, however certain generals have a limited number of ability slots available.
Here you can find a brief overview about the Generals and their Skills. To get a general, tap on "To the generals".

The number of soldiers and total troop capacity for the alliance support in your castle keep. Alliance members can send soldiers to support your defense. All troops exceeding the support capacity limit are placed in the reserve and do not participate in battle.

Here you can choose a mode of transportation to increase travel speed. The effect and costs depend on what you choose. You can also slow down the selected units so that they arrive exactly when you need them to.
Activate auto skip to instantly skip an active cooldown when the army arrives at the target. The required time skips are directly taken from your stocks upon arrival. Any excess time skip value is payed back in form of time skips.
Return to your castle to defend it!
Return to your castle and find out what happened.
Return to your castle and find out who is responsible.

Return to your castle and start some new construction!
Return to your castle and start some new construction!

Come back quickly and protect your subjects – they need your help NOW!
Return to your castle and restore order.
Noble castle lord, your people miss you!
Come back to your castle - everyone eagerly awaits your return!
Your subjects are starting to wonder where you're hiding. Return to your castle!
Are you ready for the next adventure? Then return to your castle!
Your knights are awaiting your return - so come back to your castle soon!
The next adventure's waiting for you!
Your knights are awaiting your return - so come back to your castle fast!
The next adventure's waiting for you!
Your castle is turning to ruin!
Some knights need your help to find all the fragments of a relic.
Some marauders are offering their services in exchange for resources.
Some marauders are offering their services in exchange for resources.
Find all the pieces of the map to win your own barbarian warriors!
Find all the pieces of the map to win your own desert warriors!
Find all the pieces of the map to win your own cultist warriors!
Use this chance to upgrade your buildings further.
