The emperor will reward you richly for your heroism!
The base is built! Now we need an army to retake this land. Build tents for your soldiers!
We have our first victory! Military discipline triumphs over disorganized violence once again.
You can't complete this task while in this kingdom.
Repair more bridges to open up the kingdom!
{0} has defeated the forces who were occupying your outpost! It has now been freed and is fully in your possession once again!
Always remember that your storehouse has a limited capacity.
You are well on your way to creating an empire.
A thriving economy is the key to success.
Remember that jealous individuals may steal your resources
Your excellent leadership will undoubtedly lead to victory!
Don't get discouraged by the occasional wear and tear on your workforce. That's to be expected.
Truly the gem of your castle!
There you go! You've taken another step towards building your empire.
You can count your castle among the most beautiful in the entire kingdom!
Never rest when it comes to growing your economy!
It's time for another boost to your economy.
Your lazy subjects don't need any more rest!
We're losing a lot of builders at the moment. Perhaps construction safety would be a good idea after all!
An empire like that doesn't just build itself.
A strong economy is the backbone of every army.
Who cares about the loss of a few construction workers? We have lots more!
Don't let the unions bother you! 36 hours a day is completely acceptable.
No day should pass when you do not increase your power.
Your castle shall be the largest in the kingdom!
You can line up more buildings for construction by having multiple construction slots.
Speed things up by using rubies to complete buildings immediately.
Every time you upgrade a building, its function improves significantly.
In every castle, there is a limit to the number of production buildings that can run at full workload. Extra production buildings have a reduced workload and produce fewer resources.
If you are lacking certain resources, hire an overseer or loot them from other castle lords.
You can earn experience points from quests to advance to the next level and unlock new buildings.
Make sure that the level of public order never sinks too low. The productivity of your production buildings depends on it!
Not enough resources? Maybe you should take some from your neighbor!
The overseer makes your production buildings produce resources much faster.
You can expand your construction area with rubies now or with resources a few levels later on.
I can see you're truly a great commander! We'll definitely make good use of these plundered goods.
Scorched earth was practically all that was left!
And when the battle ends, we'll take all the rewards home!
This victory was well deserved, my lord!
They will hear of this victory at court!
And the land is a bit safer once again.
This mob won't come back anytime soon!
The people of this area owe you their thanks.
Your reputation as a merciless avenger spreads fast.
Word of your recent victories has reached the highest places.
A gang of bandits in tights has been attacking our upright tax collector!
If you continue like this, magnificent glory will soon be yours!
A few renegades have dared to disobey your tax collector!
There are poachers in your estates! If you tolerate this, it will signal weakness to your enemies.
A robber baron has infiltrated your area and is robbing undefended market barrows!
A horde of activists are actually trying to prevent our woodcutters from working!
A notorious robber baron has been up to no good lately.
An entire village has defied the tax collector and the crown. You must not tolerate such an outrage!
It's said that black magic is being practiced in a tower around here. I don't need any more proof – let's put a stop to it!
Robber barons won't come back for some time after they're defeated, but they will return sooner or later.
Robber baron castles are dark towers on the world map.
Siege tools make your attack much more effective.
Different units can plunder different amounts of resources.
Deploying an army always costs you some coins and requires a free commander.
Every unit has a counterpart that can beat it.
If you defeat the robber baron castle enough times, it'll become stronger and therefore have more loot.
Don't forget to use spies to let you to plan your attacks more effectively.
Horses let your armies travel much more quickly.
Defeat a robber baron castle so it can advance to the next level. At higher levels, you'll need to defeat the castle more than once to do this.
Let's hope that these last a little longer.
Our enemies should quake when facing our forces!
May these men serve you faithfully!
You've trained a strong new section!
I'll have them put into service straight away!
You're on your way to the throne!
Keep going and you'll make it to the top.
Who will dare to question your power after this?
It's time to draft some new troops.
We should improve our protection against enemy attacks!
Your commanders are demanding more men!
Now you'll gain the decisive advantage.
Those seeking peace must be prepared for war.
Your greedy enemies are everywhere. Show strength!
Prove your power and frighten your foes!
Soldiers regularly consume food. Make sure you always have enough in supply.
The right siege tools are the key to success in battle.
You can speed up recruitment in exchange for rubies.
Some soldiers are better suited to attacking than defending.
When defending, you always use up one tool per slot for each wave of attack.
Towers increase the number of soldiers that can be posted on the wall.
Speed things up by using rubies to complete buildings immediately.
Your defense buildings provide solid protection against enemy attackers.
More units become available to you every time you upgrade the barracks.
Having several construction slots helps you plan how to develop your castle's defense.
There are no battlements your men can't overcome!
Everyone meets their match some time!
Your subjects will make good use of the looted resources.
The glory is yours, my lord.
The enemy castle is burning and can't be attacked again for a while.
Your enemies are learning to fear you.
I wouldn't want you as my enemy!
Greedy and envious people are always watching you. Just one moment of carelessness, and you'll be in great danger!
Only one can win the fight for the throne.
Show no mercy, because your enemies will not!
There are moments when even diplomacy reaches its limits.
Your honor has been challenged. You must not permit this!
Your number of opponents is constantly rising. Defeat them while you still have the chance!
Anyone who is not your ally could soon become your enemy!
My enemy's enemy still isn't my friend!
An enemy has suffered a heavy defeat. You should use this weakness to your advantage!
Some units are better than others at looting.
If a castle is attacked and defeated, some of the buildings in it will be set on fire!
Your army is only as fast as its slowest unit.
Using siege tools is vital to improving your chances when attacking.
The bigger the army, the sooner it will be detected by the enemy.
Horses let your armies travel much more quickly.
Espionage is essential when planning an effective attack.
Melee attackers are perfect against ranged defenders.
Ranged attackers are perfect against melee defenders
When you defeat a castle, it will burn and you can't attack it again for a while.
Your treasure chamber is filling up!
Mmh, that was another good round.
Can you hear the coins jingle? Lovely!
There are sure to be more where they came from.
I love the taste of gold coins.
And some wallets have been made lighter again.
These lawfully gained treasures are all yours, my lord.
There was only minor resistance; nothing that a pillory couldn't handle.
All done, with no trouble at all!
Oh yes, I do love my work!
My lord, your coffers look a little bare. I fear they may need some attention.
Rumor has it that some citizens have put aside a few coins. I can change that!
It's time for your citizens to pay for your boundless and gracious hospitality.
I'm at the edge of my seat! This will be a good one.
Hard times mean hard measures… and high taxes.
The job of a tax collector may not be a popular one, but I can always ease my pain with money!
I'm constantly amazed how often citizens need to be reminded of things as simple as paying their taxes!
I may not be the most popular of your citizens, but I'm definitely the best paid!
Money makes the world go round!
The more time I have to collect taxes, the more I bring in!
Just a small bribe will give you a bonus on your tax takings!
A modest bribe will definitely mean no more coins go missing.
The higher your population, the more coins there will be to collect!
You should collect taxes from morning to night.
Always strike a balance between dwellings and decorative items.
Don't make me wait too long with the taxes or I can't guarantee that all the money will still be there.
Have you ever considered a little bribe?
If you can't wait any longer, you can end tax collection early.
If you own several castles, you can collect taxes in all of them simultaneously.
That was as easy as taking candy from a baby. And just as fun!
Sometimes I take home little souvenirs. Today it was the head of the main guard!
As quiet as a mouse. And just as tasty!
Some say I'm crazy! I tell them their houses are burning!
Sometimes I feel like I'm just a character in one big game. Hehe!
Did you see me coming? Of course not!
Nine out of ten voices in my head think this is a good idea!
I might be insane. But that makes me even better at my job!
I'll make sure nobody finds out about your little secret.
The agent will reach his destination more quickly with a horse.
City guards make agent missions riskier.
In the espionage window you can send your agent to carry out a military or economic espionage mission.
The more accurate the espionage, the higher the risk of getting caught!
If an agent gets caught, the castle lord will find out that you sent him!
You have the emperor's gratitude. He won't forget how you helped him in his need.
You've made a significant contribution toward bringing this war to a quick and happy end.
You're making the right friends! Carry on like that and you'll go far.
War is always an expensive affair. But your investment will not be for nothing!
War is expensive! The emperor demands a tribute from every castle lord in the empire to support our armies.
Our heroic troops have suffered some setbacks and request your aid.
It is the duty of every man of honor to support his emperor's war efforts by any means possible.
The emperor requests your help once again. It would be most advantageous for you if he owes you his gratitude.
Tap on the quest condition to make your payment to the emperor.
You can send resources to the kingdom at any time. You'll have to pay for the travel, however.
The more villages you capture, the better your productivity.
You can plunder coins and resources you need from the towers of your enemies. Or you can get them from other castle lords.
The enemy is retreating! This war will soon be won.
Once again you have proven yourself to be a worthy member of our mighty emperor's victorious army.
The emperor has greatly enjoyed your recent victories.
Once again, you have not disappointed the emperor. A few more victories, and we will defeat the enemy once and for all!
The enemy's positions have gotten weaker. Don't stop now!
Our invasion is in full swing. Go! Join in our victory!
Those cowardly dogs are hiding behind their high walls! Let's show them that nothing can stand in our way!
The enemy has revealed a weakness in his defense. Seize this chance and strike quickly!
Don't forget to use spies to let you plan your attacks more effectively.
Siege tools make your attack much more effective.
Horses let your armies travel much more quickly.
The local defenders are about as strong as your halberdiers and longbowmen.
Your subjects will make good use of the looted resources.
The glory is yours alone, my lord!
The enemy still has several strongholds in this region. Smoking them out may reward us with rich plunder.
The war is won, yet a number of scattered enemy troops remain a risk. Face them all and bring peace to the land!
You've cut off the snake's head, but you haven't defeated it yet. This region is still teeming with enemies.
Don't forget to use spies to let you plan your attacks more effectively.
Horses let your armies travel much more quickly.
Siege tools make your attack much more effective.
You can only complete construction and recruitment quests in your main castle.
You can only complete these quests in the corresponding kingdom.
Very good! Now all we need are resources to fill the storehouse.
Remember that jealous individuals may steal your resources.
If you're to become king one day, you need to find a suitable princess first. This is only proper for a true knight such as yourself.
You were able to solve the little problem with the prince by simply drafting him into service.
There was a slight misunderstanding in the matter of the captive virgin. You have freed a prince, who has made himself at home in your castle. It would be dishonorable to simply throw him out.
After the last attempt didn't work out quite as planned, you now have another opportunity to free a princess. And this time a proper one!

The idea with the witch well was a fast, and more to the point, wet solution to your latest princess problem. Now you can enter the castle again without a care - just be careful where your water comes from!
Turned out the lovely lady didn't want to be freed after all! Now you have a genuine shrew at your throat, and you aren't going to get rid of her any time soon!
It's time to make a fresh attempt at finding a suitable princess. Perhaps this time you can find a tamer one.
What terrible misfortune! Your lovely princess's appetite has led her to a tragic end.
You've found an extraordinarily lovely princess with Lady Beatrice Narrowneck. Just make sure she doesn't devour all the supplies you've put aside for the coming winter!
You've finally found a true princess! Hopefully this one will last longer than the others.
This time you have to defeat a real dragon before freeing the princess of your dreams. You need to impress your future mother-in-law!
Now that you've found your princess, you can focus on increasing your influence in the kingdom. But of course you shouldn't forget to meet the needs of your beloved lady too.
Cruel Norsemen threaten the kingdom! The emperor's herald calls all castle lords to arms. This is your chance to prove yourself!
The Norsemen are defeated, and you've returned from your campaign victorious. The emperor will not forget your loyalty.
Establish a base in icy Everwinter Glacier and face the Norsemen with courage. Impress the emperor with your strength.
Your princess has been kidnapped! Free the poor maiden, or you'll be the laughing stock of the entire kingdom.
You've freed your princess and defeated the Sultan's henchmen like it was nothing. This is truly your greatest victory!
The sultan of the Deserts of the Burning Sands is holding your princess captive. Defeat his armies and free the poor maiden!
A new danger is threatening the kingdom! It is said that actual dragons have been spotted in the Fire Peaks. Can you prove yourself against them?
You've defeated the cultists and slayed a dragon! Songs of this victory will be sung for generations to come.
Some devious cultists are attempting to control the dragons! Defeat them and their spawn so you can squash this threat to your home!
Be a member of an alliance
Noble lord, please help me in freeing my land from the cruel Norsemen! I will give you a handsome reward!
We're here at last! This is my homeland, or rather what's left of it. We have lots of work to do.
My kingdom lies far to the north, so the journey will be long and difficult. We'll need sufficient supplies and equipment.
You can either donate resources in the event screen or use rubies to travel to the icy land of the north.
Oh look, we have some guests! So you think you can challenge me? Ha! You won't last one night in the icy north!

That was Hardok Frostbeard, the Norsemen's notorious leader.
Quick, let's build a camp to protect us from the ice!
It looks very cozy, doesn't it? We really need to pay close attention to troop morale in these icy conditions!
Now we just need an army to retake this land. We should begin by building housing for your soldiers.
You need living quarters to have soldiers in your campaign camp. Each tent makes room for more soldiers.
Now it's much more comfortable, don't you think? We shouldn't be daunted by these freezing temperatures!
A cramped campaign camp lowers your soldiers’ morale. Build decorative items to improve the men's combat strength!
The level of morale determines how well your men fight on the icy winter landscape. The higher the morale, the stronger your soldiers are in battle.
Very good! Now all we need are resources to fill the storehouse.
These lands are frozen stiff. We should bring in resources and store them safely. Start by increasing the storage capacity.
You can build as many storehouses as you like here; they will all increase the total capacity.
Now that your troops have arrived, we can finally get going!
The camp is now ready for the first wave of troops! You should send your soldiers here now.
Use the event screen to send soldiers and resources over to the icy land of the north. This does take some time, however.

Your forces are ready to be deployed!
Let's show these Norsemen what tough stuff we're made of!

Finally! The first victory!
Take command of my brave knights. May they serve you honorably both here and later in your homeland.
Let's attack the tower at the foot of the hill! We'll take them by surprise.
The Norsemen are holding some of my knights captive; if you can free them, they will fight on your side!
I heard of a castle in these parts where they breed 300 wild boar. I want one, too!
Robber baron castles are dark towers on the world map. A robber baron castle will advance a level if you defeat it often enough.

You call that a victory?!
We felt bad for you so we let you win – but you won't find us so easy to beat next time!
The route is clear! On to the summit!
Those wretched barbarians have slowed our climb by destroying the bridges!
Repair a bridge by selecting it and tapping "Repair".
We've finally arrived, and my beloved home is within our grasp. But what's this?!
My castle is up in the swirling mists of the mountain's peak. If you can free it, the Norsemen will be defeated!
Reach the summit and defeat the Norsemen to free the land.

Har har! You wretched maggots, the time has come to squash you!
Tremble before the might of my dragon!
We've done it! The dragon is slain!
Oh no, a dragon! I thought they were just fairy tales! This is the hardest test we will ever face.
You need a very large army with extremely high morale to defeat a dragon.

It can't be!
This battle isn't over yet. This is a draw at best. Just you wait, I'll be back!
You've freed my castle and brought peace to my lands! Take my knights in service as a token of my eternal gratitude.
The people of this area owe you their thanks.
We have no time to waste now; we must seize the opportunity and press on!
You can also take all the knights you free here home with you at the end of the event!
This mob won't come back anytime soon!
As your troops get closer to the peak, the Norsemen start to fight back harder.
You could make battles much easier by substantially raising morale in your camp.
Your enemies are learning to fear you.
Make these barbarians pay for what they have done to my kingdom! Push them back into the Arctic Sea!
The higher you are on the mountain, the tougher the enemies will be.
You know, I don't want to complain, but I think there are too few farmers producing food here!
They just have to step it up a notch!
This was once a peaceful land. We were completely unprepared for the invasion of the Norsemen!
You can capture more towers to free more knights.
Everyone meets their match some time!
We're pushing the enemy back, don't let up now!
Use the knights you've freed sparingly; you can only get them here in the north.
There are no battlements your men can't overcome!
We are on the brink of freeing the land once and for all; peace will soon reign here again.
Remember to use tools to improve your soldiers' chances!

Ha!
My men would have defeated you left-handed if I hadn't ordered them to go easy on you! Soon the trap will close!

Enjoy your pathetic victory - it's all part of my master plan!
Bring it on, your icy grave awaits!

I'm starting to get really angry!
I could stamp on you if I wanted to, just you wait and see! You won't be laughing then!
Should we agree it was a draw? Come and meet me unarmed! We won't hurt you – on my honor!
You're starting to be a pain – I have better things to do! I'll have your blasted head if you don't surrender!
Enough! Meet me like a man! I'm waiting at the top of the hill to greet your vassals. I hope my dragon will like the taste of them!
Lord, a terrible evil has attacked my kingdom! Help me to drive out the horror! I'll reward you richly in return!
Ahh, much better, now it's not just for you skinny people.
These doors are just too narrow, nobody can walk through them!
Someone's gotta make sure they'll fit bigger people too!
We're here at last! This is my homeland, or rather what's left of it. We have a lot of work to do.
My kingdom lies far away over the Misty Mountains. The journey over the pass is long and arduous, we'll need plenty of supplies!
You can travel to my land by donating resources or using rubies in the event screen.

Look what a ghastly darkness has fallen upon my kingdom.
Let's upgrade the camp before this evil knows we're here.

Looks cozy, doesn't it?
We need to keep an eye on our troops' morale in this eerie place.
You need living quarters to have soldiers in your campaign camp. Each tent makes room for more soldiers.
This makes it much cozier, don't you think? We can't let the darkness intimidate us!
With so many soldiers here, morale in the camp will fall. Build decorative items to improve the men's combat strength!
Morale determines how well your men fight in this cursed land. The higher it is, the stronger they will be in battle.
My land is contaminated – nothing grows any more! You can send or plunder resources. First increase your storage capacity!
You can build as many storehouses here as you like; they will all increase the total capacity.
Now that your troops are here, we can finally get going!
The camp is now ready for the first wave of troops. You should send your soldiers here now!
You can transport soldiers and resources via the event screen. But that can take a while and comes at a price.
Our forces are ready! Time to let these monsters have a first taste of our mettle. Drive the darkness from these lands!
Finally! The first victory! Take command of my brave knights. May they serve you honorably both here and later in your homeland.
Let's begin by launching a surprise attack on these monsters!
Those sinister creatures are holding several of my knights captive. If you can free them, they will fight by your side!
I'm looking forward to raising your men from the dead after I've destroyed you. They will swell the ranks of my army!
We could sorely use the plundered food!
Those creatures still occupy the small villages in these parts. If we defeat them, we'll find ample resources.
You can get resources and, most importantly, food for your soldiers from the villages at regular intervals.
You don't have to sleep on the couch anymore; you can join me at last!
Don't you think the bed is a little small? I'd love something bigger!
Come on! You can find some wood somewhere!
If you make sure that morale is high, battles will go much better for you.
If you make sure that morale is high, battles will go much better for you.
My beautiful bridges have been completely destroyed! We won't make any more progress here.
We must cross the great river to reach the capital. There are two places where we can cross.
Fight your way to one of the bridges and defeat the occupiers there.

My beautiful bridges have been completely destroyed!
We won't make any more progress here until we patch them up.
Now the way is clear. Onwards!
We must repair one of the bridges to progress.
Repair a bridge by selecting it and tapping "Repair".
The way to the capital is clear. Victory will be ours!
The sinister necromancer resides in the great castle. Defeat him to free the kingdom.

How can such a miserable worm like you have so much luck?! Unbelievable!
But soon I'll be back and have my revenge!
You really did it! I had nearly given up hope. This is truly a glorious day!
Defeat the sinister necromancer and free my castle!
This will be the toughest battle of all. Raise your troops' morale as much as you can!

You've freed my castle and brought a little peace to these lands.
Accept my knights' service as a token of my eternal gratitude!
This mob won't come back anytime soon!
This land was once peaceful. We were completely unprepared for this disaster.
The skeleton warriors are as strong as halberdiers and longbowmen.
No time to waste now – let's seize the opportunity and press on!
At the end of the event, you can take all of the knights you freed back to your home castle. Deploy them wisely.
Yeeesss, bring it on! Today I will outdo even myself!
I could do with something to eat.
I have to watch my weight!
The people of this area owe you their thanks.
My people can live here again! Keep going, drive them back further!
Spare yourself many casualties by making sure morale is high.
I can see you are truly a great commander! This loot will be useful.
You've already proven that the darkness can be defeated. Don't hold back now!
Make sure you're able to feed the troops you liberated. Regularly raid the villages to get food.
Time is of the essence! Act quickly before our worst fears come true.
You can capture more towers to free more knights.
The enemy is retreating! This war will soon be won.
The enemy has revealed a weakness in his defense. Seize this chance and strike quickly!
At the end of the event, you can take all of the knights you freed back to your home castle. Deploy them wisely.

Don't get too smug about your short-term success.
I'll soon crush your ridiculous rebellion and then your men will be mine!

Enjoy your pathetic victory – it's all part of my master plan!
Bring it on, your icy grave awaits!

You're starting to be a pain – I have better things to do!
I'll have your wretched head if you don't surrender!

You can't defeat me!
Soon I shall control an army greater than your wildest dreams!
You may have gained a victory today, but the tide may turn again tomorrow. The war is not yet over!

We've finally arrived at the remains of my once glorious castle!
The time has come to set these lands free once and for all!
Yeeesss, I'll outdo even myself today!
These lazy farmers just sit around all day and don't produce enough food!

Terrible news! I'm afraid your beloved Beatrice has... well, exploded.
My sincere condolences.
Make sure you always produce more food than your soldiers consume!
You will lose soldiers if you run out of food! Produce food in the farmhouse.
I heard of your kind heart and chivalrous disposition - please save me! My stepmother is keeping me as a slave!
Ha! You ask for my daughter's hand in marriage? She may be simple, but that doesn't mean I'll let her go that easily!
What have we here? A count? But can you offer more than just a pricey title?
I will not negotiate with a man of inferior rank. My daughter is destined for high nobility!
This title must be bestowed upon you by the king.
This should be adequate for the time being.
You may own a castle, but what's the point of having land with no money? How wealthy are your estates?
Use other quests to reach level 23 in order to upgrade your dwellings to level 6.
Well there you go, it looks like you aren't totally useless after all!
You may be rich, but what good is that if you can't defend yourself? I mean, do you even have an army worth mentioning?
You must upgrade the barracks to unlock all units.
All this for that little hellcat? I'm so happy I got rid of her! Wait and see what you've got yourself into.
Okay, you've convinced me. I will give you my daughter's hand, provided you can pay her dowry.
I expect a gift that is worthy of my rank!
You have citizens in your castle. Now you can begin to collect taxes from them.
You now have your second castellan and can continue expanding!
You've achieved another milestone! Now you can expand your estate to acquire another outpost.
Upgrading your estate provides you with another castellan, which lets you capture another outpost.
Lay claim to another outpost to make your economy even stronger!
You can either capture an unoccupied outpost, or use your castellan to attack another castle lord's outpost and make it yours after a period of occupation!
I have certain ways of reminding your citizens that it is their civil duty to pay taxes.

I can't tell you how grateful I am.
Thanks to your generosity I am free at last!
It's marvelous to see how happy everyone is!
I went for a walk in the castle today and talked to the citizens. Many long for better homes.
Build dwellings to make everything look nicer!
Thank you so much! It's wonderful to bring some joy back into their lives.
I am the patron of an orphanage in the castle. Please help me to assist the poor children.
Take pity on these helpless souls!
No one must starve this winter!
Winter is coming, and if the granary isn't full by then, our poor citizens will have to go hungry.
Build more farmhouses to ensure there's enough food.
It's wonderful to see all the grateful faces.
There are more people coming to our fine castle to find a new home almost every day. We should take in everyone in need.
Better dwellings provide more space for citizens.
A band of deserters are roaming the land and destroying entire villages! We must deal with them with an iron fist.

Oh look, we have some guests! So you think you can challenge me? Ha!
You won't last one night in the icy north!
Very good! Now you're ready for your next conquest!
It's time to capture your third outpost. Upgrade your estate!
Now that you have another castellan, you can own three outposts at most.
Excellent! You are now one of the mightiest castle lords in the entire kingdom!
It is now time to claim your third outpost!
Outposts are in high demand – it can be hard to hold onto all three of them while fighting all over the world.
Excellent, now we have enough space!
Expanding the castle will let us improve our defense.
Open the build menu and tap on one of the arrows to expand the castle wall!
Excellent, you can now produce defense tools.
Our soldiers need tools that help them defend. Build a defense workshop!
You can find the defense workshop in the military area of the build menu.
This bold and hostile mob keeps trying to climb over your castle wall. Let's see how well they swim in their armor!
Build a moat to protect your castle even better!
Moats and castle moats provide an extra defense bonus. You can find them in the build menu under "Battlements."
The scientist seems to be quite excited about the many doors the new research techniques will open for us.
Technology is the future! We should start researching the latest cutting-edge technologies.
Research helps unlock many improvements, such as an increased resource production and more powerful units.
The new castle wall system sees us increase the enemy-attrition-factor to create a new experience for man and material!
Hurling rocks will really make the defense on your castle wall stronger.
You can build weapons in the defense workshop; these will give your soldiers a significant advantage in battle.
Hurling rocks, like soldiers, can be produced in the recruitment menu. It has an area designated for tools.
The art of trading consists in having no talent yourself, but simply making profits from the goods that have been manufactured by others!
You need market barrows in order to trade. You can acquire these via the marketplace.
The upgrade level of the marketplace determines how many market barrows you have. Choose a castle on the world map to trade with it.
You can use market barrows to transport resources between your castles, or to exchange resources with other lords' castles!
A new threat is brewing in the east: it's said the Cultists are bringing dragons into our world. We must stop them!

Everything is ready! Now is not the time to hesitate.
This welcome will not be so friendly!
Time is of the essence! Act quickly before our worst fears come true.
You can get to Fire Peaks from the Kingdom overview. The journey there is long and arduous and will not come cheap, however.
Be careful in this place! The volcanoes are still active, so earthquakes and gaping fissures occur frequently.
I hope you brought enough workers. You'll be losing a lot of them with all that lava around the place.
Let's start by mining and harvesting vital resources. Or at least what little this desolate place will provide.
Not much can be mined from the dead volcanic rocks. You'll need to send resources from home, at least in the beginning.
Now that the castle defense is secured, we can again focus on the economy and increasing your wealth.

Now you've at least laid a basis for providing food.
Amazing that we've discovered fertile ground here at all!
Securing a food supply is of course extremely important. Let's see what our farmers can grow in this rock-hard earth.
Make sure that you are able to feed your troops. There is no use in sending a large force here if you are unable to support it.
A volcano is not exactly the smartest place to call home. We should consider whether wood is the ideal building material for this region.
It's time to bring in some citizens to breathe life into your castle and finances.
Taxes are collected from all citizens at the same time, regardless of their kingdom.
Our first raiding patrol is ready. Let's hope that not too many fall into the lava.
We should not stay on this wretched peak any longer than necessary. Quick, let's begin positioning our army!
You can send troops to this kingdom. However, the long journey will cost a pretty penny, too. Therefore, it would be best in the long run if we recruited our units locally.
We've gained our first foothold in this wretched country. Those barbarians won't get rid of us that easily!
I don't like being so exposed in this barbarian country. You should make sure that we can defend the base.
Make sure you're able to feed your troops. There's no use in sending a large force here if you're unable to support it.
Now you're perfectly equipped to launch your first major assaults on the enemy.
Even the biggest army is worthless if it's not properly equipped.
Having the proper equipment for an assault makes all the difference when attacking the heavily fortified towers of the Cultists. It's the only way you will avoid a heavy death toll.
From now on this is where we'll collect all the loot that our victorious troops secure in the nearby villages.
This bleak volcanic rock doesn't provide for much. We'll have to acquire vital resources from elsewhere. By force, if necessary!
Force is the only way to secure the resources you need during an invasion. Build a loot warehouse! You can find it in the build menu under military.
Now we're ready to enforce our right as conquerors. Capture one of the villages and secure the local resources!

Every village that your troops capture improves the productivity of the production buildings at your castle. You can capture up to 10 villages for each type of resource, but you'll also have to be able to defend them against your enemies.

Too late! The first dragons have been sighted!
Hurry up and attack while they don't expect it!
Our first victory! Once again military discipline triumphs over disorganized violence.
Before we can face the great dragons, we must first weaken the enemy's ring of defense.
Don't forget to spy on the enemy's towers before you launch your attack. It's the only way to avoid sustaining heavy losses.
The emperor has called for the final attack! Send these creatures back to the darkness they came from!
Excellent! Your wood production has increased significantly.
You can upgrade buildings to significantly improve what they do. Improve your woodcutter!
Find the woodcutter in your castle, select it, and then tap on the upgrade arrow! It will be upgraded to level 2.

You really did it!
Never in all my life did I dream I'd see a dragon fall. This is truly a glorious day!
Even a dragon can be defeated. Gather as many troops as you can find and destroy that lizard!
The claws deal melee damage, and the fire from its mouth deals ranged damage. Use shields to try to protect your troops from the flames!
You've saved the world from calamity! The emperor will be extremely thankful. Deal with the remaining Cultists as you wish.
Did the emperor send his lap dogs out to play? Too late! You can't stop me, a new age is beginning!
Such a pity that I have to destroy you! We can always use good fighters. You should consider changing sides...
You're tough. I like it when they fight back! Maybe I'll let you live after all... You'd make a good trophy!
You don't really think you could be a threat to me and my children? I will crush your pathetic little rebellion!
Your little victory shall not stop me! Soon I alone shall rule the known world, and no one will be able to defy my dragons!
So you like playing with fire? Come right over here if you like it hot! Just make sure you don't get burnt...
Alright, you asked for it! Come and face me and my dragon. Enjoy the show, for it will be your last dance!
The new storehouse offers extra space for 1,700 wood, stone, and food.
You should build a storehouse to have enough space for your resources. If you run out of storage space, production will cease!
You can find the storehouse in the build menu.

My lord, robber barons have attacked a nearby village! They've stolen their cattle, burned their huts to the ground, and kidnapped a little girl. We must free the girl and cut those robber barons down to size!
Every army deployed on the world map needs a commander to lead it.
We must send our army out to rescue the noble lady. You need a commander to command the army.
Commanders live in the encampment building, which can be found in the build menu under military.
You can now build siege tools. They significantly increase your soldiers' chances of victory in an attack.
You should use siege tools to command a successful attack. Build a siege workshop.
You will find the siege workshop in the military tab of the build menu.
Hear ye, hear ye: the barbarians have invaded the empire! Everyone is required to join the great campaign against the Norsemen!
Everything has been prepared. We can now begin our journey to the icy north. Dress warm!
Put aside your feuds and join the emperor's army. When we stand united, we'll be able to vanquish the cruel Norsemen for good!
You can get to Everwinter Glacier from the Kingdom overview. However, the journey there is long and arduous and will come at a cost.
You don't have much time to establish a base before the barbarians come. Try to become self-sufficient, and quick!
Your subjects must go about their work dutifully, despite the freezing cold. Grumbling about it won't help.
Let's start by mining and harvesting vital resources. Or at least what little this desolate place will provide.
There are not many resources to be collected in this icy tundra, so in the beginning at least you will need to send resources from home.
Now you've at least laid a basis for providing food. Amazing that we've discovered fertile ground here at all!
Securing a food supply is of course extremely important. Let's see what our farmers can grow in this rock-hard earth.
Make sure you're able to supply enough food to the troops you send to the icy north.
The icy north is not a popular place to live, but at least with a roof over their heads your citizens will survive the night – most of them, anyway.
It's time to bring in some citizens to breathe life into your castle and finances.
Taxes are collected from all citizens at the same time, regardless of their kingdom.
The foundation for our northern army is laid. May it face all dangers head on!
We must destroy the Norsemen and strike fear into the hearts of the barbarians. Let's begin by raising an army!
You can send troops to this kingdom. However, the long journey will cost a pretty penny, too. Therefore, it would be best in the long run if we recruited our units locally.
We've gained our first foothold in this wretched country. Those barbarians won't get rid of us that easily!
I don't like being so exposed in this barbarian country. You should make sure that we can defend the base.
Make sure you're able to feed your troops! There's no use in sending a large force from the south if you're unable to support it.
Now you're perfectly equipped to conduct your first major assaults on those foul barbarians!
Even the biggest army is worthless if it's not properly equipped.
Having the proper equipment for an assault makes all the difference when attacking the heavily fortified barbarian castles. It is the only way you will avoid a heavy death toll.
From now on, this is where we'll collect all the loot that our victorious troops secure in the nearby villages.
The frozen ground of this tundra just doesn't yield much. We'll have to obtain the resources we urgently need from elsewhere.
Force is the only way to secure the resources you need during an invasion. Build a loot warehouse! You can find it in the build menu under military.
Excellent! Your enemy doesn't stand a chance against forces like these!
Siege tools and soldiers can be produced and trained in the recruitment menu.
Your castle's production has increased considerably. The troops in your villages are still consuming food from your main castle, however.
Now we're ready to enforce our right as conquerors. Capture one of the villages and secure the local resources!
The emperor has ordered the first assault! Those cowardly barbarians are hiding in their towers, but that won't stop us!
We have our first victory! Once again military discipline triumphs over disorganized violence.
Your orders are to destroy the enemy's weaker defense first.
Don't forget to spy on the enemy's towers before you launch your attack. It's the only way to avoid sustaining heavy losses.
The barbarians' defense has been weakened! Conquer one of the great fortresses and break their resistance!

The enemy is defeated! You have certainly proven yourself worthy of serving our emperor.
You've truly earned your reward.
Those cowardly pups tremble behind their high walls! Your recent victories have proven that walls alone won't protect them.
A number of castle lords are vying for the emperor's favor and are attacking the large barbarian fortresses. You will need to prove yourself against them.
Ha! My men would have defeated you left-handed if I hadn’t ordered them to go easy on you! Soon the trap will close!

Enjoy your pathetic victory - it's all part of my master plan!
Bring it on, your icy grave awaits!

I'm starting to get really angry! I could stamp on you if I wanted to, just you wait and see!
You won't be laughing then!
Should we agree it was a draw? Come and meet me unarmed! We won't hurt you – on my honor!
You're starting to be a pain – I have better things to do! I'll have your blasted head if you don't surrender!
Your armies can be deployed much more quickly with horses. Build a stable.
The stables unlock horses which increase the travel speed of armies on the world map.

That's quite enough! Come here and meet me like a man! I'm waiting for you at my castle.
Or are you chicken?

What a glorious day! The Norsemen have been defeated once and for all.
Do as you please with the few who remain.

A scientist is offering you his services!
These researchers are renowned for their pioneering inventions.
You're now part of an alliance! You can send one another units, chat with each other, and upgrade the alliance in return for powerful bonuses.

It's high time you joined a mighty alliance!
Only in an alliance can you continue to withstand any enemy over time.
Alliance members help each other in battle and in upgrading their castles. Look for an alliance close to you on the world map and send a request to its leader. Or you can even found your own!

Your production buildings are now starting to produce resources non-stop.
Here is a small reward!
You need resources to upgrade your castle. These are produced in production buildings.
You can find new buildings in the build menu.
You've smashed your foul enemy! Your soldiers will return home as soon as they have plundered the enemy’s camp.
It's time to wage war! Go to the world map and order an attack on the robber baron castle!
You can reach the world map via the globe button.
The bigger your castle's population, the more taxes you can collect. But you'll have to meet their needs too!
Watch out! The larger your population, the lower the public order in your castle! Build decorative items to increase public order.
First build another dwelling to increase the population!
More dwellings can house more citizens, and that means more taxes for you to collect!
Excellent! Now you have new citizens. Your tax collector can enjoy a feeding frenzy!
First build another dwelling to increase the population!
You can find the dwelling in the build menu.

It appears that your princess was abducted while she was out riding – again!
The fiend escaped, but we'll find him!
The abductor is none other than the sultan from the Burning Sands! It's said that he has an entire palace filled with abducted women.
Listen to the emperor! Gather your weapons! The armies of the desert people are gathering in the south and threaten our freedom.

Everything's ready, there's no more time to waste.
Get ready for a cold welcome!
Once again, we must rally to the cause and face our enemy together! Prepare for a long and hard journey!
You can get to the kingdom of Burning Sands from the Kingdom overview. However, the journey there is long and hard and comes at a cost.
Welcome to the deserts of the Burning Sands. Only the desert people know how to survive the heat and severe droughts here.
Your subjects must dutifully go about their work even if the heat is unbearable. Grumbling about it won't help!
Let's start by mining and harvesting vital resources. Or at least what little this desolate place will provide.
Not much can grow in this scorching heat. You'll need to send resources from home, at least in the beginning.
Now you've at least laid a basis for providing food. Amazing that we've discovered fertile ground here at all!
Securing a food supply is of course extremely important. Let's see what our farmers can grow in this bleak and barren earth.
Make sure you're able to supply enough food to the troops you send to this kingdom.
The desert is indeed not a very popular place to live, but at least this roof offers a bit of shade to help us survive the day.
It's time to bring in some citizens to breathe life into your castle and finances.
Taxes are collected from all citizens at the same time, regardless of their kingdom.
The foundation for our northern army is laid. May it face all dangers head on!
We will vanquish the sultan's units before they can launch an attack themselves. Soon your princess will be free again!
You can send troops to this kingdom. However, the long journey will cost a pretty penny, too. Therefore, it would be best in the long run if we recruited our units locally.
You should always strike a healthy balance between population and public order!
Now you should build decorative items and make sure public order increases again!
As the level of public order increases, so does the productivity of your production buildings!
We've gained our first foothold in this wretched country. Those barbarians won't get rid of us that easily!
I don't like being so exposed in this barbarian country. You should make sure that we can defend the base.
Make sure you're able to feed your troops. There's no use in sending a large force here if you're unable to support it.
Now you're perfectly equipped to launch your first major assaults on the enemy.
Even the biggest army is worthless if it's not properly equipped.
Having the proper equipment for an assault makes all the difference when attacking the heavily fortified towers of the Demons of the Desert. It is the only way you will avoid a heavy death toll.
From now on, this is where we'll collect all the loot that our victorious troops secure in the nearby villages.
Nothing much grows on this burning hot sand. We'll have to obtain essential resources from somewhere else.
Force is the only way to secure the resources you need during an invasion. Build a loot warehouse! You can find it in the build menu under military.
Your castle's production has increased considerably. The troops in your villages are still consuming food from your main castle, however.
Now we're ready to enforce our right as conquerors. Capture one of the villages and secure the local resources!
The desert people are hiding and waiting for us to wither in the sun. But we shall not let that happen. Begin the attack!
Your orders are to destroy the enemy's weaker defense first.
Don't forget to spy on the enemy's towers before you launch your attack. It's the only way to avoid sustaining heavy losses.
We found your princess in one of the great castles - unharmed. But it is only a matter of time before that changes!
Defeat one of the great desert fortresses and free your princess. That will teach the sultan a lesson!
The enemy is defeated! You've certainly proven yourself worthy of serving our emperor. This reward is rightfully yours.
Those cowardly pups tremble behind their high walls! Your recent victories have proven that walls alone won't protect them.
A number of other castle lords are attacking the desert fortresses to win the emperor's favor. You'll need to prove yourself against them.
My hero! Thank you for saving me! It was horrible, being at the whim of that monster! Please, never leave me again!
My lord, there was a slight... misunderstanding regarding the lovely maiden you rescued. Forgive me, I'm heartbroken.
Your pretty lady will have to wait a bit longer before I attend to her. First I get to have the pleasure of crushing you!
My henchmen will soon launch their merciless attack! Then the remains of your pitiful invasion will be buried in the sand.
Keep bloodying your heads against my walls while I toy with your princess.

I'm starting to get really angry!
I could stamp on you if I wanted to, just you wait and see!
You won't be laughing then!

I have to admit that I underestimated you, Norseman.
Because I respect you, I'll destroy you in a fair battle. Ha!

You may have won today, but the tide may turn soon.
The war has not been won yet!
That's enough, now I challenge you man-to-man! Find your courage and surrender already!

There he is, my mighty hero!
How happy I am that you protected me from these brutal men, my valiant knight!
How stylish! We're definitely on the right track towards making this little patch cozier for everyone.
Oh no, what a mess! We really should do some decorating at the castle - we're not backward barbarians, after all!
The more decorative items you have, the happier your citizens become.
This should be just enough to repair the worst of the damage!
I was never cut out for this simple country life. Just look at my hair, something needs to be done about it!
The tax collector collects coins from your citizens for you. You need to hand over the coins here in the quest window, by tapping on the task box.
Well, better than nothing I guess.
Geez, just look at these cramped dumps. This is unacceptable!
Build more dwellings for your citizens.
Ohhh! I will look splendid in my new shoes! Which ones should I take?
This disgusting filth everywhere will drive me crazy. My shoes are ruined!
The tax collector collects coins from your citizens for you. You need to hand over the coins here by tapping on the quest condition.
You could build some more woodcutters if you notice that you are lacking resources.
It'd be a good idea to upgrade several woodcutters to further increase wood production.
First place another level 1 woodcutter, and then upgrade it to level 2 like the others.
My lord, I've taken the liberty of finding a simple solution to your little problem. We've drafted our guest into the army.
Sometimes a certain degree of... discretion is necessary. This is when you should call in a specialist.
Excellent, your first agents are now available.
Agents feel most at home in the tavern.
You can find the tavern in the build menu under military.
Excellent! The enemy agents will have a much harder time now.
Protect yourself against enemy attacks and make sure your castle is safe! Build a guardhouse.
City guards protect the castle from enemy agents. The guardhouse is in the build menu under military.

Good news, I've found you a new princess!
She is being held captive in a robber baron castle not too far from here.
Excellent! You now have a rough overview of how your enemy has organized their defense.
A wise castle lord will always survey his target before attacking it. Otherwise he could be in for a nasty surprise!
Select the robber baron castle on the world map and use espionage!
Now you have a decent army - enough to free your princess!
It's time for a new and even larger army!
Some soldiers are better at attacking, while others are better at defending.
You can give these siege tools to your armies; they will make their attack much more effective.
The castle battlements should not be underestimated, you'll need siege tools to break through them.
Tools can be produced in the military menu.
You alone have vanquished the enemy! You are on your way to the top, and the princess is sure to be grateful!
Your troops are ready! It's time to squash your enemies!
Siege tools make your attack much more effective.
Up to now your woodcutters have had to saw the felled logs into planks. Specialists will make this work much faster.
Originally invented as a sport to anger environmental activists, wood production is now flourishing more than ever.
A sawmill will boost the production of all your woodcutters.
You can only build one of each type of processing building.
Expanding the castle wall gives you more space for buildings. It also creates another tower base for you to upgrade.
We need more space in the castle. Expand the castle walls!
Open the build menu and select where you want to expand.
You clearly know how to make a successful economy!
Lighten the load on the farmhouses by getting experts to grind the wheat.
Processing buildings improve the efficiency of all relevant production buildings in the castle equally.
Our army lacks variety! Why don't you train different soldier types to have more specialized forces?
Your power has grown once again!
Upgrade your barracks to unlock more soldiers.
New units are available to you every time you upgrade the barracks or the workshops.

Your recent victories have been attracting attention, and not only from friends!
Prove yourself against rival castle lords.
You now have an army worthy of your title! But remember: the bigger your army, the sooner it will be detected by the enemy.
Those seeking peace must be prepared for war.
Unlike soldiers, your tools don't eat any food! But they can only be used once.
You were victorious and have taught this castle lord the meaning of fear! Soon all will tremble with awe when they hear your name.
Attack is the best form of defense. Beat your enemies before they can ally against you!
Be careful when choosing your enemies, they may have strong allies!
Really? And who said I wanted to be rescued? You lords think you own the world, don't you? You're all the same!
You want me to keep my clothes in this rotten old thing? Ridiculous!
If I have to be here, I want to at least make it pretty. My quarters are a real dump, I don't even have a shoe closet!
You don't have enough wood? Then just take some from a neighbor!
Green? GREEN? They don't match the floors at all!
Have you looked at the rags in front of the windows recently? You call those curtains? What an eyesore!
If you don't have enough money, motivate your tax collector!
I serve as your general and military advisor. I'm responsible for securing and defending the castle, and we need soldiers for this.
What's this supposed to be? Red? Do you honestly think red goes with my eyes? Are you trying to kill me?
I'm still waiting for some decent curtains! And I don't want any cheap trash!
If you don't have enough money, motivate your tax collector!
Have things gotten better? I haven't noticed!
How can you allow your citizens to live in such ugly huts? A doghouse is more comfortable than that! Do something about it!
Build some attractive decorative items to go with your upgraded dwellings.
Is this all? I wish I had a knight who could actually satisfy my needs!
So you finally have some time for me? I'm bored. The commoners are so tiresome. I'd like an evening of fine music!
You don't have enough resources? Take some from your neighbor!
And you really think I'm going to put my heels in that shed?
It's disgraceful! I don't know where to keep my shoes in this dump.
I have nothing to wear! Everything is so last season.
Word of your honorable deeds has reached the royal court. They have offered you a higher title of nobility.
It is my honor to be able to address you as baron from now on.
The king is willing to make you a baron for a modest offering. The high costs are merely a formality, of course.
Your higher title is clear proof of your power.
It's finally time to extend your power and influence! Capture an outpost and build another castle there.
Excellent, we can now start training soldiers!
We need barracks to be able to train soldiers.
You can find the barracks in the military section of the build menu.
Every new castellan lets you capture another outpost, even if it previously belonged to another castle lord!
You need your own castellan to capture an outpost on the world map.
You now have your own outpost where you can produce resources and recruit units. But other castle lords can seize it from you too!

Select an outpost on the world map.
You can capture an unoccupied one or seize one from another castle lord.
An outpost has two resources that can be produced, but there is only an abundant supply of one. You can use the icon on the world map to see which one it is.
Please lord, just let me wring her neck! If she keeps bossing around the castle like this, people will soon run amok!
A witch well is simple and effective: if the accused drowns in the well, she was obviously innocent. If she survives, she's a witch!
There might actually be an easy way to solve this. Have you heard of a witch well?
You can find the witch well in the build menu under decorative items.
We're now ready to equip our bastion. The right building materials will make our battlements really strong!
This home is worthy of a person of your rank!
You should upgrade your Keep first. It is the most important building in your castle after all.
Upgrading the Keep reduces the building time of all the buildings in the castle!
I pity the fool who dares to challenge your might again!
Next we'll attend to the castle wall and make it impregnable!
Upgrading the castle gates and castle wall substantially increases the defense bonus during an attack. You can find the castle wall in the build menu under battlements.
Done! Your castle looks brand new again! Upgraded towers let you deploy more soldiers on the castle wall when you're under attack.
Now let's see to the towers!
Upgrading your towers increases the maximum number of soldiers that can be deployed on the castle wall.
This time I have just the lady for you! My cousin, Lady Beatrice Narrowneck, is known for her huge heart.
Excellent! I am sure she'll be thrilled.
Lady Beatrice Narrowneck is a noble lady and has expensive tastes. The castle should look top notch before she arrives!
Having lots of decorative items makes the citizens happier and the castle look better.
Everything's now ready for the noble lady's arrival.
Rumor has it that Lady Beatrice Narrowneck adores culinary delights. Let's prepare a magnificent feast!
Food can be acquired by having lots of farmhouses or by plundering other castles.
Wow, a feast! All this for me? Let's dig in!
That was just an appetizer! I want more!
I like everything but salad or healthy stuff like that.
I'm getting a taste for this!
Hey - I'm still hungry! Ain't there anything worth eating in this castle?
Just get the farmers to make more!
I can't take it any more!
Create your own coat of arms
A customized coat of arms shows your personality and can scare off your enemies. Go to Admin to create your own coat of arms.
You can change your coat of arms later on in exchange for rubies.
How stately! Your new coat of arms is quite impressive.
Your castle's production has increased considerably. The troops in your villages are still consuming food from your main castle, however.

Hooray, I'm saved! You're so brave. One day I'm going to be a big strong knight like you!
Can I live with you for a bit? I've never been to such a big castle!
It's lovely! Playing here is even more fun now!
Gosh! Your castle is huuuge! But it's pretty brown, too. Don't you want to make it more colorful?
You can find decorative items in the build menu.
Cuddles is feeling much better already! Thanks, you're a great knight!
You can donate coins by tapping on the quest condition.

Oooh, thank you!
I can finally go home!

I got word from my family! They are rebuilding our lovely village.
Oh, if only I had enough money to go home!
You can donate coins by tapping on the quest condition.

Thanks for being so nice to me and saving me from the robber barons!
You are a great knight, I will tell everyone in our village about you! Can I visit you again soon?

A new cry for help has reached us, and this time it's a genuine princess in need of rescue!
The noble lady has been held captive in a tower for some time in a nearby robber baron castle. Free her and glory will be yours!
I found this cute puppy when I was playing in the woods... Can I keep him? He hurt his paw. Could you give me some coins so I can take him to the physician?

Every village that your troops capture improves the productivity of the production buildings at your castle. You can capture up to 5 villages for each type of resource, but you'll also have to be able to defend them against your enemies.

Every village that your troops capture improves the productivity of the production buildings at your castle. You can capture up to 10 villages for each type of resource, but you'll also have to be able to defend them against your enemies.
Defeat kingdom NPCs level {0} or higher
Remember that you can adjust production in the hunting lodge at any time.
Wood and stone are not very nutritious. Your soldiers need something decent to eat. Build a hunting lodge to send your woodcutters and stonemasons out hunting.
The hunting lodge allows you to increase food production. Your wood and stone production will decrease in turn, however.
Please help us! My village was raided by Norsemen. Our homes were destroyed and our supplies plundered. Please have mercy and help us to build up our village again before we all freeze to death!
We ask for but a few resources to repair the worst of the damage.
Tap on the village to repair it. If you help us to rebuild the village, I will show you how to produce new resources in return!
Thank you! We've taken the first step toward making our home inhabitable once more. You've helped us, and therefore I will keep my promise.
A standard campfire doesn't provide the warmth required to survive the deadly cold nights of Everwinter Glacier. We have specialized in making charcoal from wood to heat our homes.
The charcoal burner will show up as a new building in the build menu. You can barter with the villagers and trade charcoal in return for goods, units, and equipment items.
Now you know our traditional techniques for making charcoal. I look forward to trading with you.
Your charcoal burners can be even more productive if you store the wood in a dry storehouse beforehand.
You can barter with the villagers and trade the charcoal you produce for goods, units, and equipment items.
The cornerstone of your new economic cycle has been laid.
Please help us to upgrade our village. We can use every resource you can spare.
Every time you work on rebuilding the village, you unlock new packs for bartering.
You are truly merciful! Soon we will be able to live a normal life again.
Your help has already been more than generous, but I must ask you for some more resources.
Every time you work on rebuilding the village, you unlock new packs for bartering.
We now have new offers for bartering.
We will have even more offers for you if you continue to help us make our village more beautiful.
Every time you work on rebuilding the village, you unlock new packs for bartering.
We now have new offers for bartering.

This pile of rubble was once my home before the desert warriors came and demanded tribute. We had little to give, and in their rage they destroyed all that we possessed. Now we don't even have a roof over our heads.
Please help us to rebuild our homes. Think of the poor children!
Tap on the village to repair it. If you help us to rebuild the village, I will show you how to produce new resources in return!
Thank you! We've taken the first step toward making our home inhabitable once more. You've helped us, and therefore I will keep my promise.
Our village has made olive oil for many generations. Trading caravans took our oil to the farthest corners of the world.
The olive grove will show up as a new building in the build menu. You can barter with the villagers and trade olive oil in return for goods, units, and equipment items.
Now you know our secret recipe for making olive oil. Use it wisely!
I can show you how to press olives and make oil quickly.
You can barter with the villagers and trade the olive oil you produced in return for goods, units, and equipment items.
The cornerstone of your new economic cycle has been laid.
Please help us to upgrade our village. We can use every resource you can spare.
Every time you work on rebuilding the village, you unlock new packs for bartering.
You are truly merciful! Soon we will be able to live a normal life again.
Your help was most generously given, but I must ask you for more resources.
Every time you work on rebuilding the village, you unlock new packs for bartering.
You are truly merciful! Soon we will be able to live a normal life again.
If you continue helping us to make our village more beautiful, we will have even more offers for you.
Every time you work on rebuilding the village, you unlock new packs for bartering.
You are truly merciful! Soon we will be able to live a normal life again.
We're ruined! The cultists took all that we had. Then they destroyed our village and left us here to starve. Please help us build it up again – we will be eternally thankful.
We don't need much to put our tents back up. Just the bare necessities.
Tap on the village to repair it. If you help us to rebuild the village, I will show you how to produce new resources in return!
Thank you! We've taken the first step toward making our home inhabitable once more. You've helped us, and therefore I will keep my promise.
Using the right techniques you can melt and process glass from the volcanoes. Our volcanic glass was in high demand in all the kingdoms.
The glass furnace will show up as a new building in the build menu. You can barter with the villagers and trade glass in return for goods, units, and equipment items.
You can barter the glass you produce in return for items from us.
You can barter with the villagers and trade the glass you produced in return for goods, units, and equipment items.
The cornerstone of your new economic cycle has been laid.
The cornerstone of your new economic cycle has been laid.
Please help us upgrade our village! We could use every resource you can spare.
Every time you work on rebuilding the village, you unlock new packs for bartering.
You are truly merciful! Soon we will be able to live a normal life again.
Your help was most generous, but I'm afraid I must ask you for more resources.
Every time you work on rebuilding the village, you unlock new packs for bartering.
We now have new offers for bartering.
We don't need much to put our tents back up. Just the bare necessities.
Every time you work on rebuilding the village, you unlock new packs for bartering.
We now have new offers for bartering.

Greetings, noble Lord. Your castle doesn't look half bad, so perhaps you're right for this task.
I have some slight trouble with pirates off my coast and am in search of men who don't mind getting their hands dirty. Of course you would be richly rewarded for your efforts.
We're finally ready. Onwards, we have no time to lose!
My kingdom resides on the famous Blade Coast. You'll need quite a few resources to travel there.
You can travel to my land by donating resources or using rubies in the event screen.

Before you lies the proud Blade Coast! My family ruled these islands for many generations, until a horde of stinking and dirty pirates showed up.
My entire fleet has vanished in this blasted fog, and now I have little left for fighting the invaders. Let's build a camp, and quick!

Looks like a good start, doesn't it?
We need to keep an eye on your troops' morale though. The fog and the sea can make many men feel uneasy.
Now that the camp is built, all that we need is an army to recapture these islands. Let's begin by building some living quarters for your soldiers.
You need living quarters to have soldiers in your campaign camp. Each tent makes room for more soldiers.

It looks so much nicer now, don't you agree?
We can't let this fog intimidate us!
Soldiers living in cramped quarters on the ships will suffer from low morale. Build decorative items to boost their morale!
Morale determines how well your men fight in a battle. The higher it is, the stronger your soldiers will be in battle.
Very good! Now all we need are resources to fill the storehouse.
This scraggy coastline has barely any resources on it. You can send resources here from your castles or plunder them from pirates.
You can build as many storehouses here as you like; they will all increase the total capacity.
Now that your troops have arrived, we can finally get going!
The camp is now ready for the first wave of troops. You should send your soldiers here now!
You can send soldiers and resources to the camp from the event screen. It takes a while and comes at a price, however.

Your army is ready!
It's time for us to show what we're made of and battle this evil. Now you can prove your worth. Defy this fog and destroy the pirate scum!
Those sinister creatures are holding several of my knights captive. If you can free them, they will fight by your side!
Let's begin by launching a surprise attack on the pirates.
Make sure that you're able to feed the troops you liberated. Fight pirate convoys on a regular basis to capture loot.
Finally! The first victory! I'm giving you command of my brave knights. May they serve you honorably both here and at a later date in your homeland.

Look, the Sea Queen has finally dared to come out of her hiding place. And here I was thinking nobody wanted to play with us any more.
It will be my special pleasure to send you and your men to a watery grave!
We could sorely use the plundered food!
The pirates have plundered all my belongings and taken them to their ships. Defeat the escort ships with their entire crews, and the resources on the convoys will be ours once more.
You can capture resources and food for your soldiers from the pirate convoys sailing the sea.
If you make sure that morale is high, battles will go much better for you.
If you make sure that morale is high, battles will go much better for you.
The fortress is ours, now nothing can stop us from taking back the kingdom!
Two great coastal fortresses stand between me and my rightful kingdom. We must capture at least one of them in order to pass. It is the only way to achieve a lasting victory.
Battle your way to one of the big fortresses, defeat its garrison, and capture it.
The fog is finally beginning to lift!
The route is clear, now let us fight our way to the heart of this fog! Somewhere in there lies the pirates' headquarters, the root of all evil.
Remember to keep raiding convoys to cover your resource costs.

I can't believe my eyes!
An actual kraken, just like in the stories of my ancestors, handed down since time immemorial!
The monster must have destroyed my fleet. Rally your forces for the attack!
You really did it! I had nearly given up hope. This is truly a glorious day!
Destroy this abomination and drive the pirates from here once and for all!
This will be the toughest battle of all. Raise your troops' morale as much as you can!

How could this happen?
My mighty kraken was defeated by a tiny worm!
You may have won the battle, but you have not won the war! I will return and visit revenge upon you and your men, I swear it!

You've defeated the kraken and broken the pirates' power. Soon all of my kingdom will be rid of this plague, and peace will return. I am truly in your debt. May my knights serve you faithfully. Consider them a token of my eternal gratitude. If you like, you can stay a bit longer and help me destroy the last remnants of the pirate vermin.
This mob won't come back anytime soon!
This land was once peaceful. We were completely unprepared for this disaster.
The pirates are as powerful as your halberdiers and longbowmen.
The people of this area owe you their thanks.
We have no time to waste now; we must seize the opportunity and press on!
You can also take all the knights you free here home with you at the end of the event!
My people can live here again! Keep going, drive them back further!
The people of this area owe you their thanks.
Spare yourself many casualties by making sure morale is high.
I can see you are truly a great commander! This loot will be useful.
You've already proven that the darkness can be defeated. Don't hold back now!
Make sure that you're able to feed the troops you liberated. Fight pirate convoys on a regular basis to capture loot.
Time is of the essence! Act quickly before our worst fears come true.
You can decide to capture other islands to free more knights.
The enemy is retreating! This war will soon be won.
The enemy has revealed a weakness in his defense. Seize this chance and strike quickly!
At the end of the event, you can take all of the knights you freed back to your home castle. Deploy them wisely.

You will need better ships in order to venture further into the fog. My fleet is lost, so I can only lend you my master shipbuilders. We will have a mighty navy built in no time. I regret to say that you will need to obtain the necessary resources so you can build the fleet yourself.
The ship has been upgraded, we can continue on our quest to take back my kingdom!
You've captured your first islands, opening the way to deeper waters. Let's upgrade your fleet!
Your fleet's upgrade level determines how far out to sea you can go, and which islands you can reach to attack.
Another successful upgrade! Now we can take back even more islands and plunder more convoys.
Upgrade your fleet to push the fog back further.
Gather the resources you need to upgrade your fleet by plundering pirate convoys and sending resources from home.
Look at it! Doesn't it look magnificent with the new upgrades? Nobody will be able to stop us now!
The fog is getting thicker, and the sea even deeper. You need more reliable ships in these dangerous waters!
Your fleet's upgrade level determines how far out to sea you can go, and which islands you can reach to attack.
The deed is done! Victory is within our grasp. Let's finish this!
Your ships have received quite a battering at sea. Your fleet needs to be especially well-equipped for the final push.
Gather the resources you need to upgrade your fleet by plundering pirate convoys and sending resources from home.

So the landlubber actually wants to stir up trouble?
Hide in your stone houses, or you'll waken a true tempest!

Don't think I'll always be this nice to a freshwater fish that's too far out to sea.
Carry on like that and you're going to make me really angry!

Yes, yes, venture ever deeper into my fog.
You and your crew are facing a cold, wet death.

You asked for it! You have sown the wind, now you shall reap the storm.
Fear the might of my KRAKEN!
Reach the center of the fog

Prove your worth as a true knight and follow the call of a queen! The villainous Captain Redbeard and his heinous pirates have raided my kingdom on the Blade Coast. Drive those miscreants out of my home and I'll reward you richly!
Thanks to your hard work, a new path has opened up for your troops.
Repair a bridge by tapping on it.
Thanks to your help, my land will soon prosper again!
Repair more bridges to open up the kingdom!
Repair a bridge by tapping on it.
Thanks to your hard work, a new path has opened up for your troops.
Repair more bridges to open up the kingdom!
Repair a bridge by tapping on it.
Thanks to your help, my land will soon prosper again!
Please help me to rebuild my kingdom and repair more bridges.
Repair a bridge by tapping on it.
You've repaired all my bridges! Your generosity truly knows no limit! I am forever in your debt.
Repair a bridge by tapping on it.
Rubies give you powerful advantages, like skipping waiting times! You can get them in the shop or from quests, events, and robber baron castles.
Use your rubies wisely to save time, sweat, and effort.
You can buy rubies in the shop using a variety of secure payment methods.
You can exchange your plundered Khan tablets for rewards at any time.
The nomads are threatening the whole empire! Attack their camps and steal those lowlifes' Khan tablets!
The more powerful the nomad camps, the more Khan tablets you can plunder!
You can exchange your plundered Khan tablets for rewards at any time.
The nomads are threatening the whole empire! Attack their camps and steal those lowlifes' Khan tablets!
The more powerful the nomad camps, the more Khan tablets you can plunder!

The more powerful the nomad camps, the more Khan tablets you can plunder!

The emperor will reward you richly for your heroism!
The threat from the nomads still exists, and the emperor wants to see results! Smash the nomads to pieces and plunder their Khan tablets!
Buy special tools from the nomad hunter to defeat the nomads easily.
The emperor will reward you richly for your heroism!

The threat from the nomads has not been dealt with yet, and the emperor wants to see results! Smash the nomads to pieces and plunder their Khan tablets!
Buy special tools from the nomad hunter to defeat the nomads easily.
