The emperor will reward you richly for your heroism!
The threat of the nomads has not been averted yet! The emperor wants to see results! Smash the nomads to pieces and plunder their Khan tablets!
Buy special tools from the nomad hunter to defeat the nomads easily.
What a triumph! Your name will bring terror to the hearts of nomads for many years to come!
Drive the nomads back to their steppe! The emperor will pay you a generous bounty for the Khan tablets you plunder.
You can only exchange Khan tablets during the invasion event, so don't waste any time!
What a triumph! Your name will bring terror to the hearts of nomads for many years to come!
Drive the nomads back to their steppe! The emperor will pay you a generous bounty for the Khan tablets you plunder.
You can only exchange Khan tablets during the invasion event, so don't waste any time!

Drive the nomads back to their steppe! The emperor will pay you a generous bounty for the Khan tablets you plunder.
You can only exchange Khan tablets during the invasion event, so don't waste any time!
What a magnificent tower! Let's see your enemies try to climb over that!
You've set the foundation for your army!
Terrific! Your enemies are going to have a hard time breaking down your defense.

Soon your enemies will want to know who they're dealing with.
Give yourself a mighty name!
Defeat desert towers at level {0} or higher
Defeat barbarian towers at level {0} or higher
Defeat cultists' towers at level {0} or higher
Onward to Berimond! Both sides claiming the throne are looking for support in their fight for the crown.
This kingdom can only be accessed during the event.
You've traveled to Berimond and can now go to battle for one of the sides claiming the throne. Good luck!
The more soldiers you can house in your camp, the better!
You need a strong army to survive this war. Build tents to house enough units.
The more tents you have in this camp, the more soldiers you can deploy in this kingdom.
The higher your troops' morale, the better they will fight!
The more soldiers are squeezed into the camp, the more morale will suffer as a result. Build decorative items to improve the men's combat strength!
Morale increases your soldiers' combat strength in attack and defense.
You should upgrade your camp even more to protect yourself against the enemy's henchmen.
Remember that our enemy's henchmen are a constant threat to your camp!
Resources are produced automatically in this kingdom. The number of resources produced depends on the number of resource villages your faction holds.
Only one can win the fight for the throne.
You will have to upgrade your camp considerably if you want to be strong enough for this war.
You can send units and tools to your camps in this kingdom. However, you can only acquire resources in Berimond itself.
Excellent! Now that the tower has been destroyed, they will never be able to rebuild it. Their resource villages now lie unprotected.
The enemy has barricaded himself in his watchtowers. We must burn them down if we want to reach the capital!
Before you can capture resource villages for your faction you need to destroy the enemy's watchtower.
Excellent! Now that the tower has been destroyed, they will never be able to rebuild it. Their resource villages now lie unprotected.
The enemy has barricaded himself in his watchtowers. We must burn them down if we want to reach the capital!
Before you can capture resource villages for your faction you need to destroy the enemy's watchtower.
Excellent! Now that the tower has been destroyed, they will never be able to rebuild it. Their resource villages now lie unprotected.
The enemy has barricaded himself in his watchtowers. We must burn them down if we want to reach the capital!
Before you can capture resource villages for your faction you need to destroy the enemy's watchtower.
Excellent! Now that the tower has been destroyed, they will never be able to rebuild it. Their resource villages now lie unprotected.
The enemy has barricaded himself in his watchtowers. We must burn them down if we want to reach the capital!
Before you can capture resource villages for your faction you need to destroy the enemy's watchtower.
Excellent! Now that the tower has been destroyed, they will never be able to rebuild it. Their resource villages now lie unprotected.
The enemy has barricaded himself in his watchtowers. We must burn them down if we want to reach the capital!
Before you can capture resource villages for your faction you need to destroy the enemy's watchtower.
Excellent! Now that the tower has been destroyed, they will never be able to rebuild it. Their resource villages now lie unprotected.
The enemy has barricaded himself in his watchtowers. We must burn them down if we want to reach the capital!
Before you can capture resource villages for your faction you need to destroy the enemy's watchtower.

Victory is within reach! The enemy's capital lies unprotected. If we attack together, we can cut off the enemy's supplies.
To battle!
The battle against the enemy's capital won't be a walk in the park. You will meet much resistance!
All of the enemy's towers have to be destroyed before the capital can be attacked.
Good work! My troops will defend the village now and supply your camp with the extra resources.
We need as many resources as we can get. The only way to achieve this is to take the enemy's resource villages!
The more villages held by your faction, the more resources you will produce in all of your camps!
This new camp suits you, but another one would suit you even better!
Expand your power by capturing more camps. Drive the enemy back to his capital!
You can capture camps from other castle lords to really increase your power!
Keep it up! There are lots more where they came from!
My enemies must burn! Show no mercy to those despicable dogs.
From time to time, your especially strong dedication to defeating the enemy will be recognized with extra rewards for your main castle.
Now you are perfectly equipped to launch your first major assaults on the enemy.
This war's frontline is constantly shifting. Build a stable so you can always reach the enemy quickly.
Horses let you cross great distances with speed. If you keep upgrading your stable, you can gain a key advantage.
The more soldiers you can house in your camp, the better!
You need a strong army to survive this war. Build tents to house enough units.
The more tents you have in this camp, the more soldiers you can deploy in this kingdom.
The higher your troops' morale, the better they will fight!
The more soldiers are squeezed into the camp, the more morale will suffer as a result. Build decorative items to improve the men's combat strength!
Morale increases your soldiers' combat strength in attack and defense.
You should upgrade your camp even more to protect yourself against the enemy's henchmen.
Remember that our enemy's henchmen are a constant threat to your camp!
Resources are produced automatically in this kingdom. The number of resources produced depends on the number of resource villages your faction holds.
Only one can win the fight for the throne.
You will have to upgrade your camp considerably if you want to be strong enough for this war.
You can send units and tools to your camps in this kingdom. However, you can only acquire resources in Berimond itself.
Excellent! Now that the tower has been destroyed, they will never be able to rebuild it. Their resource villages now lie unprotected.
The enemy has barricaded himself in his watchtowers. We must burn them down if we want to reach the capital!
Before you can capture resource villages for your faction you need to destroy the enemy's watchtower.
Excellent! Now that the tower has been destroyed, they will never be able to rebuild it. Their resource villages now lie unprotected.
The enemy has barricaded himself in his watchtowers. We must burn them down if we want to reach the capital!
Before you can capture resource villages for your faction you need to destroy the enemy's watchtower.
Excellent! Now that the tower has been destroyed, they will never be able to rebuild it. Their resource villages now lie unprotected.
The enemy has barricaded himself in his watchtowers. We must burn them down if we want to reach the capital!
Before you can capture resource villages for your faction you need to destroy the enemy's watchtower.
Excellent! Now that the tower has been destroyed, they will never be able to rebuild it. Their resource villages now lie unprotected.
The enemy has barricaded himself in his watchtowers. We must burn them down if we want to reach the capital!
Before you can capture resource villages for your faction you need to destroy the enemy's watchtower.
Excellent! Now that the tower has been destroyed, they will never be able to rebuild it. Their resource villages now lie unprotected.
The enemy has barricaded himself in his watchtowers. We must burn them down if we want to reach the capital!
Before you can capture resource villages for your faction you need to destroy the enemy's watchtower.
Excellent! Now that the tower has been destroyed, they will never be able to rebuild it. Their resource villages now lie unprotected.
The enemy has barricaded himself in his watchtowers. We must burn them down if we want to reach the capital!
Before you can capture resource villages for your faction you need to destroy the enemy's watchtower.

Victory is within reach! The enemy's capital lies unprotected. If we attack together, we can cut off the enemy's supplies.
To battle!
The battle against the enemy's capital won't be a walk in the park. You will meet much resistance!
All of the enemy's towers have to be destroyed before the capital can be attacked.
Good work! My troops will defend the village now and supply your camp with the extra resources.
We need as many resources as we can get. The only way to achieve this is to take the enemy's resource villages!
The more villages held by your faction, the more resources you will produce in all of your camps!
This new camp suits you, but another one would suit you even better!
Expand your power by capturing more camps. Drive the enemy back to his capital!
You can capture camps from other castle lords to really increase your power!
Keep it up! There are lots more where they came from!
My enemies must burn! Show no mercy to those despicable dogs.
From time to time, your especially strong dedication to defeating the enemy will be recognized with extra rewards for your main castle.
Now you're perfectly equipped to launch your first major assaults on the enemy.
This war's frontline is constantly shifting. Build a stable so you can always reach the enemy quickly.
Horses let you cross great distances with speed. If you keep upgrading your stable, you can gain a key advantage.

The battle for the crown in the Kingdom of Berimond has erupted once more. Those claiming the throne have promised a princely reward to everyone who fights under their banner. Head off to Berimond and decide the fate of the kingdom!

Welcome to Berimond, my friend! You're now part of the House of Gerbrandt's proud army of lions! Help me to defeat the barbarian bears and I'll give you a princely reward. But first of all you should upgrade your camp!

Welcome to Berimond, my friend! You're now part of the House of Ursidae's proud army of bears! Help me to crush those red kittens, and I will reward you most appropriately. But first of all you should upgrade your camp!
The capital of the House of Ursidae is burning! But victory isn't ours just yet. The enemy's henchmen still occupy parts of my land and must be driven out once and for all!
The capital of the House of Gerbrandt is burning! But victory isn't ours just yet. The enemy's henchmen still occupy parts of my land and must be driven out once and for all!
Keep in mind to always build new towers and upgrade the old ones. This lets you put more soldiers on your walls!
It's easy to get over a castle wall when the towers aren't fortified! And where else can your soldiers be protected from arrows whizzing by?
Spearmen are versatile fighters for both defense and attack.
You need defenders on your walls right away. Otherwise any backwater yokel could just waltz on in here!
Using your rubies wisely saves you time, sweat, and effort.
Rubies give you powerful advantages, like skipping waiting times! You can get them in the shop or from quests, events, and robber baron castles.
Rubies give you powerful advantages, like skipping waiting times! You can get them in the shop or from quests, events, and robber baron castles.
Using your rubies wisely saves you time, sweat, and effort.
Rubies give you powerful advantages, like skipping waiting times! You can get them in the shop or from quests, events, and robber baron castles.
You can safely buy rubies in the shop using various payment methods.
Using your rubies wisely saves you time, sweat, and effort.
You can safely buy rubies in the shop using various payment methods.
You can safely buy rubies in the shop using various payment methods.
I bring news from a lost kingdom, buried deep beneath the earth. Come, let us discover its secrets and write history together. Are you ready for a journey down into the depths?
Have you got everything ready? Don't forget your caving helmet. Mine has saved my life in many a rockfall!
We are just a few building materials and supplies away from beginning our adventure. Isn't that exciting?
You can travel to the underworld by either paying resources or using rubies in the event screen.

Look, there through the rocks! It's the cave castle – the center of the underworld! If only these vile fiends weren't blocking our path. They thwarted my last expedition and captured my men. Oh, did I forget to mention that?
Now the reinforcements can come. Soon you can take the fight to the fiends.
A friendly word will not help us much against the fiends. They only understand the language of the sword. You should build more tents so that you can support more troops underground.
You need living quarters to have soldiers in your camp. With each tent you will make room for more soldiers.
Morale seems to be growing. What a difference a few decorative items can make.
The darkness down here is taking a heavy toll on our troops' mood. Maybe a few decorative items might improve their spirits.
Morale determines how well your men fight in the underworld. The higher it is, the stronger they will be in battle.
The first thing we need to do is find a place for all our supplies. That way our men won't have their food contaminated with moss and cave mushrooms.
We cannot afford to let the supplies run out as we penetrate deeper into the depths. It's happened to me once before and trust me, from then on things went from bad to worse.
You can build as many storehouses here as you like; they will all increase the total capacity.
These soldiers are truly courageous. But I have seen many strong men take to their heels when they saw a fiend for the first time.
We need well trained warriors to withstand the fiends. Otherwise our adventure will be over before it begins.
You can transport soldiers and resources via the event screen. However, that takes a while and comes at a price.
The camp is ready! Now we can pit ourselves against the fiends. But watch out – people say that the fiends eat absolutely anything. We certainly do not want to fall into their hands.
We did it! We're still alive! And my men as well. Thankfully they didn't end up being roasted on a spit.
The first tower stands before us. It looks like some of the men from my last expedition are being held there. Maybe you can liberate them!
Remember that fiends also use defense tools.
The first hurdle is overcome! Now for the rest of the underworld. I can barely imagine what secrets are in store for us. Let's not waste any time!
That's enough resources for us to advance further. If our supplies run low, however, there are lots of other resource lairs in the cave.
Resources are hard to come by underground. The fiends store everything in guarded resource lairs. It can't hurt to pay them a visit or two.
You can obtain resources, and especially food for your soldiers, from the villages at regular intervals.
Now you can send for reinforcements. Who knows what terrors are lurking in the darkness.
The cave is bigger than I expected. It would be wise to send some more troops. But we need more living quarters and decorative items before we do that.
You need living quarters to have soldiers in your camp. With each tent you will make room for more soldiers.
We've made it half way. I can hardly imagine what secrets lie hidden on the other side of the chasm.
The cave is split in two by a massive chasm in the ground. If we are to cross it, we first have to defeat the towers guarding it.
Fight your way to one of the bridges and defeat the occupiers there.
Oh no, an underground river! We can't go on. And just like that, all our dreams of fame and glory are extinguished. We will return in shame and disgrace! Oh wait, there's a bridge over there...
Now we can continue. Please forget my little outburst back there. I was a little nervous. That will never happen again!
This bridge is our lifeline, although it's certainly seen better days. It's good that you've brought a few hard-working craftsmen with you.
Repair a bridge by tapping on it.
We're here! There's the entrance. Now we just have to fight off those fiends and all the treasure and wisdom of the Underworld will be ours.
The cave castle is almost within reach. Inside there's the royal archive, a collection of ancient knowledge. Oh and there's the treasure vault of course, that's probably more your kind of thing.
Remember to keep raiding resource lairs to cover your resource costs.

We're here – King Midos' Palace! Oh no, fiends as far as the eye can see. But I haven't come this far to turn back now! I'll have the last laugh over those scholars from the imperial academy and reveal the final secret of this city!
That was a hard fight. Thank you for taking my sword away from me. It takes me a long time to calm down after the fury of battle.
Hand me a sword! This is one fight I will not avoid. I'm going to rip the secrets of the Underworld from the fiends with my bare hands!
This will be the toughest battle of all. You should bolster your troops' morale as much as you can.

Can you feel the breath of history in these halls? There is so much to discover here! Here I feel I am realizing my true destiny. Without you I would never have made it here. Take what you want from the vault and thank you for your help!
You are a great explorer and a true warrior! If we had met each other earlier, there would probably have been fewer deaths on my last expedition.
Another tower is blocking our path. But I'm sure that won't pose a problem to you, will it?
The fiends are as strong as halberdiers and longbowmen.
There were definitely more fiends there than in your first battle. The further we go, the more difficult it becomes to make progress.
The only way to get past these towers is to attack them full on. But I'm sure your men will manage that without trouble.
The fiends are as strong as halberdiers and longbowmen.
Hmmm... I can't see a single fiend left alive. I guess I'll have to start my research on them another time.
Other than the fact that the fiends will eat anything that moves, we know very little about them. It would be worth our while to study this mysterious species in more detail.
The fiends are as strong as halberdiers and longbowmen.
The fiends' towers are foul, scary places. And filled with these bones! I hope they didn't once belong to... you know.
The fiends are hardly interested in the rest of the cave. They stay in their towers and let everything else turn to ruin. Let's examine some of their dwellings in more detail.
The fiends are as strong as halberdiers and longbowmen.
Obviously the fiends don't know the meaning of "peace proposal". Good that your men were on hand after the leader of the fiends hurled me through the air.
I would never have thought we would have to fight against so many fiends. Will all the blood spilled here be worth it in the end? Maybe we should just talk to them.
The fiends are as strong as halberdiers and longbowmen.
You have driven the last fiend from the Underworld. The souls of the deceased inhabitants can now finally find peace.
The fiends only have a handful of towers left under their control. If you conquer them, the Underworld will be free once more.
The fiends are as strong as halberdiers and longbowmen.

Look what I found with the fiends. These runes tell the history of the underworld. According to them, it once extended across countless caves like this one, until a terrible disaster occurred. Come, let's make more progress and uncover more tales!

Here are some more runes. The underworld was once a rich land, full of gold, jewels and treasure. But King Midos' greed knew no end, and so he ordered mines to be dug deeper and deeper in search of hidden treasure. That was the start of the disaster.

The story continues here. Down in the depths, the treasure hunters stumbled across the fiends. Looking for new hunting grounds, these monsters crawled out of their caves and fell upon the citizens of the underworld. There was no escape.

The story continues here. The fiends could not be stopped, and fleeing was the only option left. Only King Midos' imperial guard could lead the people out of the city and save them from death. But the King had other plans.

Instead of protecting his subjects, the King locked himself in his treasure vault with his imperial guard, while his kingdom was laid to waste. However, it was not long before the fiends brought his life to a gruesome end. And thus one man's greed led to the downfall of an entire people.
What a shame that your craftsmen didn't take care to retain the architectural style. That said, the bridge does look sturdy.
Another broken bridge. I don't know if it was destroyed by the torrential floods or if the builders just were not particularly good at their jobs.
Repair a bridge by tapping on it.
What a shame that your craftsmen didn't take care to retain the architectural style. That said, the bridge does look sturdy.
Another broken bridge. I don't know if it was destroyed by the torrential floods or if the builders just were not particularly good at their jobs.
Repair a bridge by tapping on it.
What a shame that your craftsmen didn't take care to retain the architectural style. That said, the bridge does look sturdy.
Another broken bridge. I don't know if it was destroyed by the torrential floods or if the builders just were not particularly good at their jobs.
Repair a bridge by tapping on it.
What a shame that your craftsmen didn't take care to retain the architectural style. That said, the bridge does look sturdy.
What a shame that your craftsmen didn't take care to retain the architectural style. That said, the bridge does look sturdy.
Repair a bridge by tapping on it.
It seems we've now repaired every bridge in this city. Now let's see who says that great explorers cannot be great builders.
Another broken bridge. I don't know if it was destroyed by the torrential floods or if the builders just were not particularly good at their jobs.
Repair a bridge by tapping on it.
Welcome to the master level! You cannot afford to underestimate your enemies here.
You can now start the event at master level. Mighty enemies are in store for you, but as a reward you can earn precious rune gold.
Dismantle your camp to access the master level. If you've already dismantled it, you can start right away.

Now the reinforcements can come. Soon you can take the fight to the fiends.

Repair a bridge by tapping on it.
It seems we've now repaired every bridge in this city. Now let's see who says that great explorers cannot be great builders.
Another broken bridge. I don't know if it was destroyed by the torrential floods or if the builders just were not particularly good at their jobs.
Repair a bridge by tapping on it.
I've found a buried tunnel that seems to lead deeper down into the earth. Even I have no idea what's hiding below. Shall we risk another adventure and pit ourselves against the great unknown?

We're here – King Midos' Palace! Oh no, fiends as far as the eye can see. But I haven't come this far to turn back now! I'll have the last laugh over those scholars from the imperial academy and reveal the final secret of this city!
My lord, you should build a military hospital! Although your soldiers may be willing to die for you, I'm certain that they would much happier to live for you!
Many units don't die on the battlefield, but rather succumb to their wounds later on. Building a military hospital in your home castle could bring them back from death's door.

Very good, my lord! Under my charge, your wounded soldiers will soon be able to put their lives in the balance for your cause again. But keep in mind that there's only a limited number of beds for the wounded here!
Let's get to work, my lord! Don't you worry now - blood washes out easily.
Your wounded soldiers are awaiting treatment in the military hospital, but I'm afraid the medicine isn't free and the healing will take some time.
As good as new again! I hope I don't see these boys back here anytime soon - but of course that depends on you too!
You will have no need to fear an enemy with a loyal friend at your side!
Invite friends to the game via the friends menu. You will earn valuable rewards for every new friend that accepts your invitation and plays the game with you.
Bring every enemy to their knees with your friend's help! Invite even more friends to continue expanding your power!
You will have no need to fear an enemy with a loyal friend at your side!
Invite friends to the game via the friends menu. You will earn valuable rewards for every new friend that accepts your invitation and plays the game with you.
Bring every enemy to their knees with the help of your friend! Invite even more friends to keep expanding your power!
You will have no need to fear an enemy with a loyal friend at your side!
Invite friends to the game via the friends menu. You will earn valuable rewards for every new friend that accepts your invitation and plays the game with you.
Bring every enemy to their knees with the help of your friend! Invite even more friends to keep expanding your power!
Your military hospital could use a new addition. You must still have some construction materials in your storehouse.
Amazing! More beds and a brand new operating room. My most generous lord, you truly know how to make a simple nurse happy.
Wow, look at what a little bloodletting and a few bitter pills can do. These men can't wait to get back on the battlefield and fight for you!
Wouldn't you like to donate a new wing to the hospital, my benevolent lord? Of course it will bear your name!
Now even more wounded soldiers can find spots in our new rooms and heal quicker than ever. I've already got some shots ready to get them motivated!
The smithy still needs to straighten out the dented armor, but your muscular soldiers are ready to return to the battlefield and demand justice!
Recruiting units as fast as possible will lay the foundation for victory over your enemies!
The right training makes weaklings into real warriors! Start researching the necessary training equipment for your barracks as soon as possible!
Strength training decreases the time needed to recruit units in your main castle.
Sawdust is flying! Attack and defense tools will now be produced faster in your main castle.
Your enemies are laughing at you from behind their high walls! But with enough tools you can overcome any obstacle!
Let's hope that none of your loyal subjects snore too loudly. But if they do, there's a cozy, soundproof spot for them in the broom closet under the stairs!
No space for new dwellings in your main castle? With a little imagination, you can accommodate your subjects in a way that will save more space.
You can use bunk beds to increase the population in your main castle.
The best thing since sliced bread
The production building with the highest basic production always runs at full workload. Therefore it always pays off to replace your old production buildings with new and better ones!
A forester doesn't only chop down trees, he also makes sure that new ones are planted and grown. This lets him produce even more wood than an ordinary woodcutter does.
Your wood supply shouldn't run out as quickly now that you have forest lodges. They will definitely pay off in the long term.
The production building with the highest basic production always runs at full workload. Therefore it always pays off to replace your old production buildings with new and better ones!
It's impressive how fast work gets done at the stone works. That's real progress!
The stone works has the best and most cutting-edge tools at its disposal. No wonder it can produce lots more stone than a stone quarry!
Your farmers can store more grain in a granary than in their farmhouse. That means they can produce even more food in one day.
The production building with the highest basic production always runs at full workload. Therefore it always pays off to replace your old production buildings with new and better ones!
What a feast! Build enough granaries and your soldiers will never have to go hungry.
Iron ore is collected from this mine. Castle lords who want to become a living legend shouldn't be satisfied only building with wood and stone.
The production building with the highest basic production always runs at full workload. Therefore it always pays off to replace your old production buildings with new and better ones!
Thanks to this iron mine, you'll soon have enough iron ore for new construction.
The ore is processed in the iron works. This cuts back on work for the miners in the iron mine and results in higher iron ore production.
Make sure that the level of public order never sinks too low. The productivity of your production buildings depends on it!
The flames in the furnaces are blazing day and night. This is truly the beginning of a new age for your empire.
You should build a home for the scientist so that he can begin his work right away.
Research helps unlock many improvements, such as an increased resource production and more powerful units.
The tower stands! For now at least... The scientist can begin his mysterious research. Let's hope he doesn't blow up the castle!
You can dispatch troops from other kingdoms to the Storm Islands on the Map of Kingdoms.
You can build a cargo ship like you construct a building in your castle. Cargo ships can secure the aquamarine you collect in the form of cargo points.
Your alliance's total number of cargo points determines which rewards you will receive when the moon storm hits.
You can plunder aquamarine from other castle lords.
There is a limit on how often a storm fort can be attacked. Once the limit is reached, the island will temporarily disappear from the world map.
Aquamarine stored on cargo ships can't be plundered. Larger cargo ships can store more aquamarine and give more cargo points.
You can swap aquamarine with Luna at her trade boat or store it on cargo ships. Unsecured aquamarine will be lost when the next moon storm arrives.
Resource islands must be occupied for a certain period before your troops can return home with the loot.
If your troops on the resource island are defeated before the occupation time is over, you won't receive any resources!
Once a resource island has been successfully plundered by a castle lord, it will disappear from the world map.
The ruins of an old well were discovered in front of your gates. Rumor has it that this well has the power to grant wishes! But you'll have to build it up again first.
The wishing well gives you the chance to double your rubies! You can find it in front of your castle gates.
The wishing well is indeed an impressive sight, but does it actually have magical powers? It can't hurt to try!

Congratulations, you're well on your way to becoming a living legend! From now on, you can collect legendary experience points to increase your legendary level. Your experience level will remain at 70, however. In addition, you can now unlock legendary skills in the hall of legends. These grant you powerful bonuses for attack and defense. You'll also have access to new production buildings that produce even more resources.
You will have no need to fear an enemy with a loyal friend at your side!

You will have no need to fear an enemy with a loyal friend at your side!
Invite friends to the game via the friends menu. You will earn valuable rewards for every new friend that accepts your invitation and plays the game with you.
Bring every enemy to their knees with the help of your friend! Invite even more friends to keep expanding your power!
You will have no need to fear an enemy with a loyal friend at your side!
Invite friends to the game via the friends menu. You will earn valuable rewards for every new friend that accepts your invitation and plays the game with you.
Bring every enemy to their knees with your friend's help! Invite even more friends to continue expanding your power!

Khan tablets are more than just decorations. The Herald of the Invasion is willing to trade beautiful decorative items and special equipment in exchange for them.
The Herald of the Invasion only accepts Khan tablets as payment.
Good choice! The battle against the nomads should also pay off for you in the end.
Good choice! The battle against the nomads should also pay off for you in the end.

You can exchange the Khan tablets you've plundered for rewards at any time.
The nomads are threatening the whole empire! Attack their camps and steal those lowlifes' Khan tablets!
The more powerful the nomad camps, the more Khan tablets you can plunder!
The emperor will reward you richly for your heroism!
The threat of the nomads has not been averted yet! The emperor wants to see results! Smash the nomads to pieces and plunder their Khan tablets!
Buy special tools from the nomad hunter to defeat the nomads with ease.
Good choice! The battle against the nomads should also pay off for you in the end.

Buy special tools from the nomad hunter to defeat the nomads with ease.
What a triumph! Your name will live on as a nightmare in the legends of the nomads forever!
Drive the nomads back to their steppe! The emperor will pay you a generous bounty for the Khan tablets you plunder.
You can only exchange Khan tablets during the invasion event, so don't waste any time.
Good choice! The battle against the nomads should also pay off for you in the end.
