The Herald of the Invasion only accepts Khan tablets as payment.
Craftsmanship decreases the time needed to produce attack and defense tools in your main castle.
Your soldiers need enough food. Build a farmhouse to start producing it!
You need coins to recruit soldiers. Build dwellings and collect taxes! It's the only way to finance your growing army.
Loyal friend, at last you've arrived. Your bravery has won you a knighthood and your very own castle. Please allow me to act as your counsel during your first steps as a castle lord.
You need resources to upgrade your castle. Start by building a woodcutter to produce wood.
It's time to take care of defending our castle.

Expand the castle wall to get more room for buildings and new tower bases too.
This option is in the build menu.

Now we're ready to organize our defense.
Open the military menu!
I'll head off now and return in 30 minutes with the taxes I've collected!

The entire court is abuzz with excitement! The rare jewel aquamarine has been brought to the Great Empire! This precious stone embodies the splendor and essence of the ocean and has caught the interest of the nobles! In their wisdom, they have requested that all alliances embark on expeditions to collect as much aquamarine as possible. Imperial trading licenses are hereby awarded to all castle lords!
Set sail for the Storm Islands! Now that you've provided enough resources and coins, your expedition can begin.
The ships and your men are ready for the long journey! I'm eager to see whether you will succeed. Best of luck and bon voyage!
With these men you should be able to get plenty of loot. What are you waiting for? Get going and seize everything your opponents have to offer!

You have enough enemies to keep you busy – the Storm natives and countless other castles lords. Make sure to strike before they attack you! Recruit soldiers in your barracks or dispatch troops from the Great Empire.
Not too bad at all! The cargo ship secures your aquamarine and transports it to the empire when the next moon storm arrives.

Word of the precious aquamarine has brought over many castle lords and alliances from the Great Empire. Don't let them challenge you for your treasure! Plunder their aquamarine and secure it on a cargo ship!
Terrific, the other castle lords were exceedingly generous. Remember to always secure your own aquamarine on the cargo ships so the same thing does not happen to you!

Due to the limited number of storm forts and resource islands, there is not enough aquamarine for everyone. But I'm sure the other castle lords still have piles of aquamarine that they would be happy to surrender to you.
Good work! Keep it up. The more aquamarine you pinch from other castle lords, the less they will be able to give to the nobles when the next moon storm arrives.
Don't give up just now! The time until the next moon storm arrives is constantly dwindling away! Make the most of this chance and claim other castle lords' aquamarine for yourself!
You have acquitted yourself well. The Storm natives are tough and courageous, but they could not stand in your way. Make sure you don't get overconfident though!
The islands with the big stone heads are called storm forts. Pay them a visit and plunder aquamarine to secure on a cargo ship.
Not too shabby. If you continue in this fashion, your castle will soon be overflowing with aquamarine. Just do not forget to build enough cargo ships!
Remember that other castle lords are also on the hunt for aquamarine. Beat them to it and attack the forts of the Storm natives!
Courage is all well and good, but the treasures of the world are the preserve of the strong and the cunning.
Don't rest now, my lord! The aquamarine won't collect itself! Set sail and plunder the forts of the Storm natives.
It was kind of the Storm natives to collect all the resources for you, don't you think? It will be some time before this resource island can be attacked again.
Can you see those islands with the big stone temples? The Storm natives store mountains of resources there – all for you! You merely have to occupy the island for long enough.
It is important to take possession of as many resources as possible before the next moon storm. Don't stop now!
Resource islands disappear temporarily after being plundered. Don't let the loot evade your grasp and beat the other castle lords to it!
Respect, you are truly talented! Don't let my praise go to your head though, there are still plenty of islands in the ocean.
Only the bravest lords make it this far - it's time to claim the storm natives' resources for yourself! Plunder more resource islands!

Well then, did you make it through the journey safe and sound? Welcome to my home! The Storm Islands are an archipelago made up of thousands of islands in an endless ocean! Someone like you could plunder some valuable loot here. Your men have found this old castle and put it back into working order, so you won't have to start completely from scratch. Use the castle as a base, explore the surrounding waters, and plunder lots of aquamarine. Let's get started!
Setting out for the Storm Islands

Are you ready to plunder some valuable loot? I hail from the Storm Islands, far off in the eastern sea. The people there are proud warriors and great seafarers and have taught many invaders the true meaning of fear. Nonetheless, the journey is worth the effort, since the Storm Islands are the only place you can plunder precious aquamarine! Set sail and embark on the adventure!

The nobles will give generous rewards to all the alliances who collect aquamarine. But beware! From time to time, the Storm Islands sink into the sea because of the moon storm - so choose wisely when to begin your expedition!
Word of the value of aquamarine has enticed many castle lords and alliances from the empire. Do not let them challenge you for your treasure! Plunder their aquamarine and secure it on a cargo ship!
You can build cargo ships exactly like a building in your castle. The aquamarine you collect can be secured by cargo ships in the form of cargo points.
Terrific, the other castle lords were exceedingly generous. Remember to always secure your own aquamarine on the cargo ships so the same thing does not happen to you!

The number of storm forts and resource islands is limited, meaning there is not enough aquamarine for everyone. But the other castle lords are sure to have masses more aquamarine that they would be happy to surrender to you.
The total number of cargo points of your alliance members determines which rewards you will receive when the moon storm arrives.
Don't let up now! The time until the next moon storm arrives is always dwindling away! Make the most of this chance and claim other castle lords' aquamarine for yourself!
You can plunder aquamarine from other castle lords.
Not bad at all! The cargo ship has secured your aquamarine, and you will be able to give it to the nobles after the moon storm.
Good, keep it up! The more aquamarine you pinch from other castle lords, the less they will be able to ship when the next moon storm arrives.
Use the shortcut to finish your task faster.
Your castle is already starting to look much nicer! Decorative items will increase public order in your castle, while dwellings will decrease it.
If you want to become king, you need a name that inspires both awe and respect.
Let's prepare for the attack! Build a siege workshop!
My lord, a nearby robber baron castle has threatened to claim our estates. It's time we take the fight to our enemies!

Let's set-up our defenses.
Open the military menu!
This should keep your castle protected against enemy attacks for now. But don't forget to fortify your defenses regularly!
Welcome to your new castle, young lord. Come, let me show you around.
Your castle requires an abundance of resources in order to thrive. Let us begin by building a woodcutter.
Good, you have built your first woodcutter. Let's now increase its productvity!
Expanding the castle walls will create more space to build on. This option can be found in the build menu.

Your citizens can't live here for free, of course!
Send me out and I'll collect taxes from your citizens.

Your castle is starting to look worthy of a true king! I have other matters to attend to now, but I will return to offer more guidance soon. In the meantime, I shall leave you in the hands of my most trusted advisors. Remember to regularly consult the quest book for advice on how to make your castle prosper.

Excellent, I see you have built some barracks. The lands beyond your castle walls can be dangerous, so a well trained army is essential.
Let's recruit some soldiers now.
Tap the woodcutter and place it in the castle!

Now confirm the position.
You can relocate the building at any time.
Tap the top expansion to enlarge your castle!
You can find new buildings in the build menu.
Open the build menu and select where you want to expand.
Every time you expand your castle walls, you will get more space for building. Your castle will also get another tower base for you to upgrade.
You can find new buildings in the build menu.

Your production buildings are now starting to produce resources non-stop.
Here is a small reward!
You need a variety of resources to upgrade your castle. Build a stone quarry now.
You can find the barracks in the military section of the build menu.
We need barracks to be able to recruit soldiers.
Excellent! Now we can start recruiting soldiers.
Spearmen are versatile fighters that can be used for both defense and attack.
You can find decorations in the decorative items section of the build menu.
Wonderful! Having lots of decorative items makes your citizens happier and the castle look better.
You need a commander to lead an army.
Commanders live in the encampment building, which can be found in the build menu under military.
Every army deployed on the world map needs a commander to lead it.
Now we need more space in the castle. Expand the castle walls!
Open the build menu and tap where you want to expand.
Every time you expand your castle walls, you'll get more space for building. Your castle will also get another tower base for you to upgrade.
Decorative items increase public order inside your castle, which in turn increases the productivity of many buildings.
You need plenty of food to feed your army. Build a farmhouse and start producing food!
The size of your army depends on your food production. If you run out of food, your soldiers will starve. Food is produced in farmhouses.
Make sure that you're always producing more food than you consume!
You can enter any name you find worthy. Swear words and discriminatory or insulting names will not be accepted, however.
This name is truly one of legends. Your subjects will speak of you with awe and respect.
You should build a storehouse to ensure you have enough space for your resources. If you run out of storage space, production will cease!
You can find the storehouse in the civil section of the build menu.
The new storehouse offers extra space for 1,700 wood, stone, and food.
Build another dwelling to increase the population!
Building dwellings will increase your castle's population, and that means more taxes for you to collect!
Excellent work, but watch out! The larger your population, the lower the public order in your castle. Build decorative items to increase public order.
You will find the siege workshop in the military tab of the build menu.
Siege tools significantly increase your soldiers' chances of victory in an attack.
Our soldiers need tools to help them defend. Build a defense workshop!
You can find the defense workshop in the military section of the build menu.
Excellent! Now you can produce defense tools.
It's time to bolster your castle's defenses.
Tap on one of your castle wall's free tower bases to build a tower.
Very good! This formidable tower already has your citizens feeling safer.
You can donate coins by tapping on the box in the quest dialog.
Coins donated! Your people are grateful for you generosity!
Robber baron castles are dark towers on the world map. A robber baron castle will advance a level if you defeat it often enough.
You can find decorations in the decorative items section of the build menu.
The support of your alliance members can help your castle prosper and keep your lands safe.
The protection of your new alliance will make you stronger and more powerful than ever before.
The bigger your army gets, the more food it consumes! Build farmhouses to produce more food!
Always keep an eye on your food production or you could lose soldiers.
Good job! Remember to keep building and upgrading your farmhouses to match food consumption.
You can find robber barons on the world map.
Terrific! You've defeated the villainous robber barons!
Add some beauty to your castle and increase public order by building decorative items.
The decorative items look terrific, and your citizens are happier as well.
Use the slider to distribute your defenders on the front and flanks and determine the balance of melee and ranged soldiers.
Your castle should be secure against enemy attacks for now. Don't forget to fortify your defenses regularly!
Your citizens have been working extra hard to prepare the castle for your arrival. You can reward them with a donation of gold.
Defeat robber baron castles and make a name for yourself on the battlefield!
An impressive victory! You showed these lowlifes who's in charge here.
Expand your castle walls to create more space for new buildings.
Wood is an important building material. Upgrade your woodcutter to increase wood production in your castle.
You need lots of wood to construct and upgrade buildings in your castle, so remember to upgrade your woodcutters regularly.
Excellent! Now you are producing enough wood to construct more buildings.
You need a variety of resources to upgrade your castle. Build a stone quarry now.
You can find new buildings in the build menu.

Your production buildings are now starting to produce resources non-stop.
Here is a small reward!
Armies march on their stomachs, so make sure you always have enough food supplies to feed your soldiers.
A magnificent hall of legends is exactly the way to show the world your true greatness. Use it to manage your legendary skills and your power will expand tremendously!
Every level of the hall of legends gives you one valuable point. The legendary skills take effect in battles against other castle lords with a legendary level.
The hall of legends makes your castle shine with a mighty brilliance. Now that this golden beauty is complete, your neighboring castle lords will go green with envy.
You won't regret your choice! I can't wait to ride into battle under your banner. Let's recruit an army as fast as we can and teach your enemies the meaning of fear!
Noble lord, please let me offer you my services. A war is won with more than just muscle - it also takes strategy and foresight. I will show you how to lead your troops to victory!
You've made the right choice! Raw power and a heavy mace aren't the only way to win a battle. I'll show you how to bring your enemies to their knees with skill, speed, and a sharp blade!
You can donate coins by tapping on the quest condition.
You can donate coins by tapping on the quest condition.
You can donate coins by tapping on the quest condition.
Your encampment doesn't exactly look like a good place for planning battles. Decorative swords and shields would create the perfect backdrop for planning your next attack, don't you think?
All of these swords and shields make the encampment look like a proper military tent. They really get you motivated to plan your next attack!
We should definitely make some model figures of your armies so we can arrange them on a map of the battlefield. That way we can keep a clear overview of everything.
Magnificent! These model figures are really lifelike! They'll make forging battle plans even more exciting.
A merchant has offered me an original edition of the blade dancer's codex, but the price is too high. Please purchase it for me - I'll be eternally grateful!
Thank you from the bottom of my heart! This codex is truly beyond value for a blade dancer.
I'm not a man of many words, but I've taught you everything I know about preparing for a campaign. Now I must dedicate myself to the fight again. You'll find me on the battlefield!

I am confident that you now possess the knowledge necessary to succeed in battle. I will leave you to your planning and focus on supporting your warriors on the battlefield instead. It has been an honor to meet you!
Now that you know the ins and outs of battle planning, it's time for me to turn my attention back to the fight. A blade dancer belongs on the battlefield, after all!
Hurray, it's done! The construction is complete, and your small but stylish military hospital is ready to admit wounded soldiers.
My lord, your soldiers are constantly being beaten down by battles, hunger, and the cold of the north. Let's build a military hospital so we can finally care for our wounded!
Wounded units will be sent to the military hospital in their respective home castle in order to heal.
Your carpenters have done great work! Your men will certainly welcome it the most, but I'm also very excited to have a bigger military hospital.
My lord, keep in mind that there will be just as many battles up north as anywhere else. It's about time to expand the military hospital so we can care for more wounded.
Wounded soldiers don't need any food while in the military hospital.
Terrific! The military hospital has plenty of space. I can do an even better job here than ever before. You'll see your men back at their posts in no time at all!
The barbarians are slowly becoming a proper threat. We should take precautions and upgrade the military hospital even more so we can treat larger numbers of wounded.
Units that you don't want to treat can be discharged from the military hospital to make space for others.
As you can see, I always keep my promises! These men have been completely healed and are now as fresh as new recruits. They're already itching for their next battle!
Even small wounds can have fatal consequences if your men are weak from the cold as well! Send them to me straight away if they are wounded.
Strong units that have been wounded are brought to the military hospital even if there is no space for them. They will replace the weaker units there.
Even if the new military hospital is small, there's now some hope for your wounded soldiers. Trust my healing skills - you will soon have your men back as good as new!
Oh, this heat ... it's killing me! And gangrene also thrives far too well in a desert climate like this. My lord, we urgently need to build a military hospital!
Every military hospital upgrade increases the number of wounded units that you can treat at the same time.
Very good! By upgrading the military hospital, we've increased the number of available beds. Now I can care for considerably more wounded.
Some of the soldiers mentioned that desert warrior attacks have become more frequent recently. It would be wise to upgrade our military hospital so we're ready for anything.
Healing wounded units costs coins, but it's cheaper than recruiting new soldiers.
Welcome to the new wing of your military hospital! I've taken the liberty of naming it after you.
I don't like to be the bearer of bad news, but without a new military hospital upgrade, we soon won't be able to keep up with the number of wounded.
Wounded units will be sent to the military hospital in their respective home castle in order to heal.
These soldiers are fully recovered and ready to storm into battle for your glory again. A small word of praise would be greatly appreciated...
This land is full of danger: desert warriors and poisonous beasts threaten your men. But you can just send them to me! I'll heal them with my skillful touch.
Wounded soldiers don't need any food while in the military hospital.
Done! Even though we had to cancel construction of the military hospital upgrade three times due to volcanoes, we were still really quick in the end.
Don't your soldiers already get wounded often enough? And now we have volcanoes as well ... let's construct a military hospital as fast as possible!
Units that you don't want to treat can be discharged from the military hospital to make space for others.
What a relief! The men recover so quickly here. Perhaps volcanic ground does have healing properties after all?
I can treat burn wounds quickly and efficiently. Send the wounded men to me, my lord, and they'll be ready for battle again in no time at all!
Strong units that have been wounded are brought to the military hospital even if there is no space for them. They will replace the weaker units there.
Bigger, more comfortable, and with the pleasant smell of fresh paint. I much prefer working in this upgraded military hospital - and your men are taking full advantage of it as well!
I have a request for you: let me upgrade the military hospital! In a place like this, we'd better take full precautions so we have no regrets later.
Every military hospital upgrade increases the number of wounded units that you can treat at the same time.
The new upgrade of the military hospital is a success! Now I won't have to worry about your men as much. We're in a good position to treat the wounded.
These frightful cultists have filled me with a terrible sense of doom. Perhaps we should upgrade the military hospital even more just to be safe!
Healing wounded units costs coins, but it's cheaper than recruiting new soldiers.
Everything has been prepared. We can now begin our journey to the icy North. Wrap up warm!
Put aside your feuds and join the emperor's army. United, we will be able to vanquish the cruel Norsemen for good!
You can get to Everwinter Glacier from the Kingdom overview. However, the journey there is long and arduous, and will come at a cost.
Put aside your feuds and join the emperor's army. United, we will be able to vanquish the cruel Norsemen for good!
All the holes in the tent walls have finally been patched! But now there's no longer a constant draft, your troops have started to complain about the musty odor. You can never make everyone happy!
Your tents have seen better days. You can hear the wind whistling through all the holes dotting the outer tent walls. You should do something about it - and quick!
Upgrade your tents to save space for other useful buildings.
Thanks to the upgraded tents, all of your warriors now have their own cots. Hopefully this will end all the squabbling about who sleeps where.
Your army is growing and growing, and space is slowly getting tight in your tents. Some of your men actually have to spend the night on a stone floor!
If you upgrade your tents, you can send more soldiers here from your castles.
Every one of your warriors can now find a warm place to sleep in these tents. The nights in Berimond can get very cold, you know.
A mighty army like yours needs appropriate accommodations. Upgrade your tents before your men have to set up camp under the open sky!
Upgrade your tents to save space for other useful buildings.
Your troops seem to like the new decorative items. Exactly the thing we need for their morale.
Your warriors might not look it, but they have an excellent eye for design. Add some beauty to your camp and they will gladly go to battle for you!
Decorative items increase the morale and combat strength of your troops.
This palisade will no longer be as easy to climb over. The generous layer of grease on the posts will surely cause your opponents to give up quickly.
The enemy is becoming more and more creative when it comes to getting over your palisade. You should build it a bit higher before your opponent gets the idea of using stilts!
Don't forget to reinforce your walls with defense tools.
You have now fully upgraded your fortifications. If anyone manages to break through now, they have earned it!
Your opponents are leading bigger and bigger armies into battle. Upgrade your towers to place more defenders on your palisade.
Every tower increases the number of defenders on your walls.
Now you're in the position to hire more auxiliaries at one time.
Auxiliaries are the backbone of your army. Upgrade your training grounds so you can hire more at one time.
Every time you upgrade the training grounds, you increase the number of auxiliaries that you can hire at one time.
Now your auxiliaries will be able to enjoy proper training sessions. Well, "training" might not be the best word for it. "Running the gauntlet" is more like it.
Auxiliaries can't wait to throw themselves into battle. As soon as they've mastered the training grounds, they're ready to go!
Auxiliaries are an excellent addition to your regular troops in Berimond since they don't need any food or space in your tents.
Your soon-to-be auxiliaries won't be getting in each other's way as much thanks to your upgraded training grounds. This will considerably reduce the number of fatal accidents.
Your commanders are demanding more auxiliaries on the battlefield. I'm sure you can find a way to hire more of them at one time.
Auxiliaries are just as good at attacking as defending.
Great! You can never send auxiliaries to their graves... er, into battle fast enough.
Remember to reinforce your army with auxiliaries. These dauntless warriors will thank you for giving them the chance to prove themselves in battle.
Auxiliaries may not be the strongest units, but they are available at a moment's notice and are a dime a dozen!
Now your auxiliaries will be able to enjoy proper training sessions. Well, "training" might not be the best word for it. "Running the gauntlet" is more like it.
Auxiliaries can't wait to throw themselves into battle. As soon as they've mastered the training grounds, they're ready to go!
Auxiliaries are an excellent addition to your regular troops in Berimond since they don't need any food or space in your tents.
Your soon-to-be auxiliaries won't be getting in each other's way as much thanks to your upgraded training grounds. This will considerably reduce the number of fatal accidents.
Your commanders are demanding more auxiliaries on the battlefield. I'm sure you can find a way to hire more of them at one time.
Auxiliaries are just as good at attacking as defending.
Upgrading the auxiliaries' headquarters really paid off in the end. Now we have even more auxiliaries on hand.
Your auxiliaries prefer an open night sky to the usual roof of a tent, and thanks to the strict leadership of their commanders, all of them are still there in the morning, too!
Auxiliaries are an excellent addition to your regular troops in Berimond since they don't need any food or space in your tents.
Excellent! Now that we have more people to handle the paperwork, your auxiliary commanders will have more time to keep a larger number of troops close by.
Your auxiliary commanders are slowly finding it harder to keep an eye on all their troops. You should expand the auxiliaries' headquarters to send a larger number of auxiliaries on to the field.
Auxiliaries provide for themselves and don't drain your food supplies. So don't hesitate to put lots of them in your army!
Space is a bit tight with the desk in there, but at least the guy keeping the records now can actually read and write!
With more troops and the high, um, fluctuation of your auxiliaries, there's just no way to avoid bureaucracy if you want to have even more auxiliaries.
Wounded auxiliaries aren't brought to the military hospital since there are already enough fresh recruits ready to replace them quickly and for a low price.
This what collaboration looks like: directly from the suggestion box into the trash! As if the men didn't already have enough to worry about!
If your commanders had to deal with fewer complaints from the soldiers, they could surely command even more auxiliaries. We should use the next upgrade to get a bigger trash can!
Auxiliaries leave the army after the Battle for Berimond. But while they are there, they remain an affordable and extraordinarily useful reinforcement for your troops.
Take a look at that! True daredevils, each and every one of them!
Auxiliaries are true patriots who gladly put their lives on the line for their home and our cause - as long as the price is right, of course.
Auxiliaries are an excellent addition to your regular troops in Berimond since they don't need any food or space in your tents.
You've collected a considerable troop of auxiliaries here. Keep in mind that you can hire even more without any problems as soon as you have, um, used up this lot.
Auxiliaries are a cheap and useful reinforcement for your cause in the battle for the throne of Berimond. The more you hire, the better!
Auxiliaries provide for themselves and don't drain your food supplies. So don't hesitate to put lots of them in your army!
All the holes in the tent walls have finally been patched! But now there's no longer a constant draft, you troops have started to complain about the musty odor. You can never make everyone happy!
Your tents have seen better days. You can hear the wind whistling through all the holes dotting the outer tent walls. You should do something about it - and quick!
Upgrade your tents to save space for other useful buildings.
Thanks to the upgraded tents, all of your warriors now have their own cots. Hopefully this will end all the squabbling about who sleeps where.
Your army is growing and growing, and space is slowly getting tight in your tents. Some of your men actually have to spend the night on a stone floor!
If you upgrade your tents, you can send more soldiers here from your castles.
Every one of your warriors can now find a warm place to sleep in these tents. The nights in Berimond can get very cold, you know.
A mighty army like yours needs appropriate accommodations. Upgrade your tents before your men have to set up camp under the open sky!
Upgrade your tents to save space for other useful buildings.
Your troops seem to like the new decorative items. Exactly the thing we need to boost morale!
Your warriors might not look it, but they have an excellent eye for design. Add some beauty to your camp and they will gladly go to battle for you!
Decorative items increase the morale and combat strength of your troops.
This palisade will no longer be as easy to climb over. The generous layer of grease on the posts will surely cause your opponents to give up quickly.
The enemy is becoming more and more creative when it comes to getting over your palisade. You should build it a bit higher before your opponent gets the idea of using stilts!
Don't forget to reinforce your walls with defense tools.
You have now fully upgraded your fortifications. If anyone manages to break through now, they have earned it!
Your opponents are leading bigger and bigger armies into battle. Upgrade your towers to place more defenders on your palisade.
Every tower increases the number of defenders on your walls.
Now you're in the position to hire more auxiliaries at one time.
Auxiliaries are the backbone of your army. Upgrade your training grounds so you can hire more at one time.
Every time you upgrade the training grounds, you increase the number of auxiliaries that you can hire at one time.
Great! You can never send auxiliaries to their graves... er, into battle fast enough.
Remember to reinforce your army with auxiliaries. These dauntless warriors will thank you for giving them the chance to prove themselves in battle.
Auxiliaries may not be the strongest units, but they are available at a moment's notice and are a dime a dozen!
Upgrading the auxiliaries' headquarters really paid off in the end. Now we have even more auxiliaries on hand.
Your auxiliaries prefer an open night sky to the usual roof of a tent, and thanks to the strict leadership of their commanders, all of them are still there in the morning, too!
Auxiliaries are an excellent addition to your regular troops in Berimond since they don't need any food or space in your tents.
Excellent! Now that we have more people to handle the paperwork, your auxiliary commanders will have more time to keep a larger number of troops close at hand.
Your auxiliary commanders are slowly finding it harder to keep an eye on all their troops. You should expand the auxiliaries' headquarters to send a larger number of auxiliaries on to the field.
Auxiliaries provide for themselves and don't drain your food supplies. So don't hesitate to put lots of them in your army!
Space is a bit tight with the desk in there, but at least the guy keeping the records now can actually read and write!
With more troops and the high, um, fluctuation of your auxiliaries, there's just no way to avoid bureaucracy if you want to have even more auxiliaries.
This what collaboration looks like: directly from the suggestion box into the trash! As if the men didn't already have enough to worry about!
If your commanders had to deal with fewer complaints from the soldiers, they could surely command even more auxiliaries. We should use the next upgrade to get a bigger trash can!
Auxiliaries leave the army after the Battle for Berimond. But while they are there, they remain an affordable and extraordinarily useful reinforcement for your troops.
Take a look at that! True daredevils, each and every one of them!
Auxiliaries are true patriots who gladly put their lives on the line for their home and our cause - as long as the price is right, of course.
Auxiliaries are an excellent addition to your regular troops in Berimond since they don't need any food or space in your tents.
You've collected a considerable troop of auxiliaries here. Keep in mind that you can hire even more without any problems as soon as you have, um, used up this lot.
Wounded auxiliaries aren't brought to the military hospital since there are already enough fresh recruits ready to replace them quickly and for a low price.
Auxiliaries are a cheap and useful reinforcement for your cause in the battle for the throne of Berimond. The more you hire, the better!
Auxiliaries provide for themselves and don't drain their food supplies. So don't hesitate to put lots of them in your army!
A whole new world of architecture has opened with the invention of build items, which will help make your buildings become more productive! Build a construction yard to start using them!
You will need to build a construction yard to use build items in your castle.
Extraordinary! Let's put these build items to good use!
Now we have a construction yard in the castle, we can assign build items to specific buildings.
Open the build items menu to assign your build items.
Excellent. The castle is one step closer to architectural perfection!
Assign a build item to a building.

My lord, I bring distressing news. A new menace threatens the safety of our lands. For years, the borders of our Empire have been protected by a band of warriors under the stewardship of a brave commander known as the Ivory Queen. However, our spies have reported that mercenary armies marching under the flag of the King of Shadows have ambushed her encampments and killed her loyal warriors. The queen was able to escape capture, but is now being hunted down by the king's pawns. We must find her before the enemy!
The attack on the Ivory Queen's encampments bear all the hallmarks of a nomad ambush. We should loot their camps to see if they are hiding anything that may help us find her.
The stronger the nomad camp, the more Khan tablets you can find!
These nomads were just pawns in the King of Shadows' plan. We found no sign of the queen, but your armies did find her Ivory crown.
Our looting of the samurai camps has angered the King of Shadows! He has commanded one of his generals to lead an invasion of our lands! We must drive them back.
You can find foreign invader and samurai camps to attack on the world map.
Congratulations, the king's gambit has failed! There is no sign of the queen, but your soldiers were able to loot some valuable resources.
The King of Shadows has sent bounty hunters to the Burning Sands. They have set up base with the desert warriors of the kingdom. They must be looking for the queen!
Desert towers can be found on the world map of the Burning Sands. A desert tower will advance a level if you defeat it often enough.
We were unable to find any trace of the queen, but by defeating the desert warriors we can be sure she hasn't yet fallen into their hands.
The King of Shadows has sent his trusted Black Knights to request military support from the Kings of Berimond. We must destroy their camps before they can forge an alliance!
It doesn't matter which faction you attack, every victory will earn you gallantry points.
Your gallant efforts have prevented the King of Shadows' knights from recruiting any more allies! We have also found a rare gem belonging to the Ivory Queen!

My lord, our search for the Ivory Queen will require all the resources we can get our hands on! The Herald of the Invasion is willing to trade special equipment and units in exchange for Khan Tablets.
The Herald of the Invasion only accepts Khan tablets as payment.
Good choice, my lord! These new items will surely help us prepare for the King of Shadows' next move.
The King of Shadows has assembled a mercenary army to avenge the fall of his Black Knights, and the empire is now overrun with invaders! We must drive them back.
You can earn glory points by defeating foreign castles and castle lords on the world map.
The enemy armies are retreating, my lord! Your soldiers also found the queen's Ivory Helm in the possession of one of the King of Shadows' pawns.
There are whispers that the Ivory Queen is being held captive in the Storm Islands. We should raid their forts to see if she can be found.
You can swap aquamarine with Luna at her trade boat or store it on cargo ships. Unsecured aquamarine will be lost when the next moon storm arrives.
You have plundered a fine amount of aquamarine from the storm forts, but there was no sign of the Ivory Queen. We must keep searching.
A merchant claims to have some information vital to our quest. Perhaps he will be more willing to share what he knows if you spend some of your Khan tablets in his shop.
You can exchange your Khan tablets for valuable goods by visiting the Herald.
The merchant revealed that a fair-haired maiden traded this gem for some equipment this morning. It is a gem of the Ivory Queen, my lord. She is still alive!
The King of Shadows is preparing his generals for an invasion! We should loot their resources before they can build a force capable of overpowering us!
Always remember to keep enough space for the resources you loot.
Great work, my lord. We have weakened our enemies and bolstered our own supplies. A tactical masterstroke, indeed.
An invading army marches towards our lands under the command of a ruthless general known as the Black Bishop. Defeating his armies may help us in our search for the Ivory Queen.
You can find foreign invader and samurai camps to attack on the world map.
Congratulations, the Black Bishop and his armies have been defeated! Your soldiers also found a rare decoration and have brought it back to your castle.
Your slaying of the Black Bishop has greatly angered the King of Shadows. He has turned to his allies in Berimond to exact revenge. We should travel to Berimond to intervene.
It doesn't matter which faction you attack, every victory will earn you gallantry points.
Great work, my lord! You were able to re-establish your influence in Berimond before it was too late!
The King of Shadows has sent a mercenary army of Khan warriors into our lands to put an end to our search for the queen! We should defeat these menaces and loot them of their precious Khan Tablets.
You can exchange the Khan tablets you've plundered for rewards at any time.
Great work, my lord. Not only did your men loot many Khan Tablets, but they also found the queen's Ivory Sword. A finely crafted weapon indeed.
We intercepted a scroll from one of King of Shadows' spies. Apparently the Ivory Queen was spotted crossing the border into the Fire Peaks. We must get to her before the cultists.
Cultists' towers can be found on the world map of the Fire Peaks. A cultists' tower will advance a level if you defeat it often enough.
We were unable to find any trace of the queen, but by defeating the cultists we can be sure she hasn't yet fallen into their hands.
Invading armies march towards our lands under the command of a bloodthirsty general known as the Black Rook. Defeating these armies may help us in our search for the Ivory Queen.
You can earn glory points by defeating foreign castles and castle lords on the world map.
The enemy are retreating, my lord! Your soldiers also found a rare gem belonging to the queen in one of the defeated camps. There's still hope!

Our spies have reported that the Ivory Queen was loaded onto a ship in chains! The ship bore the flag of the King of Shadows and is heading for the Storm Islands. We must raid their forts and find her.
You can swap aquamarine with Luna at her trade boat or store it on cargo ships. Unsecured aquamarine will be lost when the next moon storm arrives.
You have plundered a great deal of aquamarine from the storm forts, but there was no sign of the Ivory Queen. Her ship must have been diverted.
The Herald of the Invasion claims to have some information vital to our quest. Perhaps he will be more willing to share what he knows if you spend some of your Khan Tablets in his shop.
The Herald of the Invasion only accepts Khan tablets as payment.
The herald revealed that an army tasked with delivering the queen to the King of Shadows stopped by his shop and traded this gem for some tools. He said they were heading for Berimond!
Our spies have reported that the army in possession of the Ivory Queen has set up camp in Berimond while they re-supply! This could be our chance to rescue her!
It doesn't matter which faction you attack, every victory will earn you gallantry points.
You fought gallantly, my lord! We may not have found the queen, but you certainly left your mark on the battlefields of Berimond.
An army marches through our lands under the command of a sadistic general known as the Black Queen. Our spies report they are transporting the Ivory Queen to the court of the King of Shadows.
You can find foreign invader castles and samurai camps to attack on the world map.
A resounding victory, my lord! We found a rare gem belonging to the Ivory Queen, but the queen herself couldn't be found. They must have smuggled her away.
My lord, our search for the Ivory Queen will require all the resources we can get our hands on! We should loot our enemies to ensure we are ready for the King of Shadows' next move.
Always remember to keep enough space for the resources you loot.
Great work, my lord. We have weakened our enemies and bolstered our own supplies. A rewarding gambit, indeed.
A nomad army has been tasked with delivering the Ivory Queen to the court of the King of Shadows! We must loot their camps and free her before it is too late.
The stronger the nomad camp, the more Khan tablets you can find!
The Ivory Queen has been rescued, my lord! She was so grateful for your bravery that she has pledged her services to your court as a military commander.
The shop is your source for purchasing rubies and resource packs. Rubies give you powerful advantages, such as skipping waiting times!
You can buy rubies and resource packs in the shop using a variety of secure payment methods.
Good work! Remember to use your rubies wisely to save time, sweat, and effort.
Loyalty to the true king will be handsomely rewarded. Are you willing to accept the challenge and take the fight to the foes of the Empire?
Participate in the season event to earn season points.
You have proved your loyalty to the true king. Take this reward as a sign of my recognition.

My lord, a Black Knight from the court of shadows wishes to join our ranks. He has sent word that he can no longer serve under the increasingly cruel command of the King of Shadows, and pledges his loyalty to you. As a show of faith, he will provide information about our enemies to prove his loyalty to our cause. I take him at his word, but we should proceed with caution. I suggest we investigate his information before allowing him into our ranks.
The Black Knight sends word that an army of foreign invaders marches towards our borders. The King of Shadows has put his plan to destabilize the safety of our lands into motion!
You can find foreign invader castles to attack on the world map.
It looks as though the information provided by the Black Knight was genuine. The foreign army has been repelled. Great work, my lord.
The King of Shadows has grown suspicious after our victory against the foreign invaders and has turned to the Robber Barons to find the mole in his ranks. We must protect the Black Knight!
Robber baron castles are dark towers on the world map. A robber baron castle will advance a level if you defeat it often enough.
The Robber Barons have been crushed and the Black Knight's identity remains secure. Your men also found a finely crafted helmet on the battlefield.

An army of Nomads march to pay tribute to the King of Shadows. Fortunately, foul weather has forced them set up camp in our lands. We should take this opportunity to relieve them of their precious Khan tablets!
You can exchange the Khan tablets you've plundered for rewards at any time.
Not only have we been able to fill our own coffers with Khan tablets, but we were able to prevent them falling into the hands of the King of Shadows!
The King of Shadows has hired a blacksmith to forge a crown to celebrate the impending fall of the Great Empire. Such hubris must not go unpunished. Let's make sure the crown never reaches his court.
Always remember to keep enough space for the resources you loot.
This victory shows your people who the true ruler of these lands is. I must admit, this crown has been finely crafted indeed. It would be a shame for it to go to waste!
The war with the King of Shadows shows no sign of ending. We will need all the resources we can get our hands on if we want be victorious. It's time to put our Khan tablets to good use.
You can exchange your Khan tablets for valuable goods by visiting the Herald.
These supplies can certainly be put to good use in our fight against the King of Shadows' forces.
The King of Shadows has turned to the Barbarians of the Everwinter Glacier in search of allies for his invasion of the Great Empire. We must weaken their armies before an alliance can be forged.
Having the proper equipment for an assault makes all the difference when attacking the heavily fortified barbarian castles. It is the only way you will avoid a heavy death toll.
Great work, my lord! The barbarians have been crushed before an alliance could be made. The Black Knight's information is proving to be highly valuable.

Our efforts in driving back at the King of Shadows have been successful so far, but some castle lords in the Great Empire have been less resolute than you. You should crush those who been seduced by the evil king.
You can earn glory points by defeating foreign castles and castle lords on the world map.
Anyone foolish enough to align themselves with the King of Shadows deserves to be punished. Excellent work, my lord.
The Black Knight has sent a warning! He advises us to stock up on resources in preparation of the King of Shadows' next move. We should rally the troops and prepare for future battles.
Always remember to keep enough space for the resources you loot.
A fine horde indeed, my lord. These supplies will only make our castle stronger and better prepared for the King of Shadows next move.

The King of Shadows grows more desperate by the hour and has sent his trusted lieutenants to request military support from the Kings of Berimond. We must destroy their camps before they can come to an agreement.
It doesn't matter which faction you attack, every victory will earn you gallantry points.
Another resounding victory, my lord. I think the Black Knight has proven himself to be a loyal ally. We should consider finding a way to safely bring him to our castle.
Terrible news, my lord! The King of Shadows has discovered the Black Knight's betrayal and has ordered a foreign army to return him to the king's court for execution. We must intervene!
You can find foreign invader and Bloodcrow castles to attack on the world map.
Great work, my lord! You saved the Black Knight from execution. The shadow armies have fled the empire and our lands are safe once again.
Loot resources from enemy castle lords
If you can't finish this quest in time, you can complete it instantly with rubies.
My lord, a nearby robber baron castle has threatened to claim our estates. You are now fully prepared to launch an attack against them!

Finally, it's complete - my greatest invention yet! An invention that will change the power and fortunes of your kingdom forever! An invention I call: The fusion forge!
In terms of practical application, this new forge allows you to improve the quality and power of the decorations in your castle, but I also have big plans for its future development! Who knows, maybe soon you'll be able to improve your heroes and their equipment!
It's all rather ingenious, if I do say so myself, but incredibly simple to master. Why not pay a visit to the forge and try it for yourself?
You can exchange your samurai tokens for valuable goods in the samurai shop.
The samurai carry huge piles of tokens with them. Defeat samurai camps and loot them!
The stronger the samurai camp, the more samurai tokens you can find!
Luck is on your side. Invest your hard earned samurai tokens wisely and acquire useful rewards.
Don't slow down now! Loot more samurai tokens to buy even more valuable goods in the samurai shop.
You can buy special tools at the samurai armorer to defeat the samurai more easily.
A pleasure doing business with you, honorable lord. Please grace my humble store with you presence again soon.
Honorable lord, I'd gladly give you some exotic goods from the Far East in return for some samurai tokens.
You can keep your samurai tokens even after the samurai invasion ends. This means you can save them for especially valuable rewards.
You can exchange your samurai tokens for valuable goods in the samurai shop.

You can buy special tools at the samurai armorer to defeat the samurai more easily.
With so many samurai tokens, you can make almost all your wishes come true in the samurai shop!
Loot as many samurai tokens as possible! They can be exchanged for exotic goods in the samurai shop.
You can keep your remaining samurai tokens until the next samurai event! They will not be lost.

Our scouts have discovered a hidden tunnel that leads to a new realm beyond the mountains! This secret passage is very unstable and only accessible for a limited time, but the rewards that await at the other side are certainly worth the risk. It's time to conquer the Outer Realms.
The Outer Realms is a special event in which you can compete with players from around the world on a new temporary event server. Journey to the realm now to earn valuable rewards.

My lord, you might remember that in the past you had some…"challenging" encounters with various princesses. While nobody could blame you for wanting to forget about this whole affair, we recently found out that the princesses left behind some very valuable relics. Maybe this can make up for all the trouble.
Despite valiant efforts, Prince Jean Baptiste lost his heirlooms to vile robber knights. Rally your troops and reclaim the relics.
Some of Princess Beatrice's belongings were flung all the way to the Everwinter Glacier. Recover the valuable relics from the northern barbarians.
Sultan al-Killah did not steal Princess Fiorella's heart, but some of her relics! Take revenge and lead the charge against the desert warriors!
Maybe Princess Augusta was not a witch… but she did have connections to the dragon cult. Attack the cultists and recover their relics!
Donate {0} {1} to complete the quest condition?
Loot castles belonging to other castle lords
Loot castles belonging to other castle lords

Science is a marvelous thing. Through science we have been able to eradicate disease, improve our understanding of the natural world, and develop new and efficient methods to obliterate our enemies. My lord, allow me to present to you the Relicus!
The Relicus allows you to realize the full potential of your relic equipment, heroes and gems, providing you the tools your need to build an army capable of wiping our enemies off the face of the planet! A true victory for science!
Come, let us construct a shop in which the Relicus can work his magic.
The Relicus helps you unlock the full potential of your relic equipment, heroes and gems, allowing you to build armies capable of crushing your enemies!
An army won't last long on the battlefield without equipment, so a spacious armory is always a useful building for war-waging castle lords.
Cultists have infiltrated your area and are robbing undefended market barrows!
The cultists have been up to no good lately.
Rubies give you powerful advantages, like skipping waiting times! You can get them in the shop or from quests, events, and cultist shrines.
Rubies give you powerful advantages, like skipping waiting times! You can get them in the shop or from quests, events, and cultist shrines.

Here you can see a list of all the quests currently available in the Tangled Wilderness.
Fulfill all the conditions of a quest to complete it and receive rewards for your castle. Many quests will grant you experience points, which allow you to increase your player level.
There are no time limits to fulfill these quests. Completing a quest will unlock further quests.
Select a particular quest to learn more about it.
Reach the center of the fog

Greetings, noble Lord. Your castle doesn't look half bad, so perhaps you're right for this task.
I have some slight trouble with pirates off my coast and am in search of men who don't mind getting their hands dirty. Of course you would be richly rewarded for your efforts.
Welcome to the master level! You cannot afford to underestimate your enemies here.
You can now start the event at master level. Mighty enemies lie in wait, but as a reward you can earn more precious pearls.

Before you lies the proud Blade Coast! My family ruled these islands for many generations, until a horde of stinking and dirty pirates showed up.
My entire fleet has vanished in this blasted fog, and now I have little left for fighting the invaders. Let's build a camp, and quick!

Looks like a good start, doesn't it?
We need to keep an eye on your troops' morale though. The fog and the sea can make many men feel uneasy.
Now that the camp is built, all that we need is an army to recapture these islands. Let's begin by building some living quarters for your soldiers.
You need living quarters to have soldiers in your campaign camp. Each tent makes room for more soldiers.

It looks so much nicer now, don't you agree?
We can't let this fog intimidate us!
Soldiers living in cramped quarters on the ships will suffer from low morale. Build decorative items to boost their morale!
Morale determines how well your men fight in a battle. The higher it is, the stronger your soldiers will be in battle.
Very good! Now all we need are resources to fill the storehouse.
This scraggy coastline has barely any resources on it. You can send resources here from your castles or plunder them from pirates.
You can build as many storehouses here as you like; they will all increase the total capacity.
Now that your troops have arrived, we can finally get going!
The camp is now ready for the first wave of troops. You should send your soldiers here now!
You can send soldiers and resources to the camp from the event screen. It takes a while and comes at a price, however.

Your army is ready!
It's time for us to show what we're made of and battle this evil. Now you can prove your worth. Defy this fog and destroy the pirate scum!
Those sinister creatures are holding several of my knights captive. If you can free them, they will fight by your side!
Finally! The first victory! I'm giving you command of my brave knights. May they serve you honorably both here and at a later date in your homeland.
Let's begin by launching a surprise attack on the pirates.
Make sure that you're able to feed the troops you liberated. Fight pirate convoys on a regular basis to capture loot.

Look, the Sea Queen has finally dared to come out of her hiding place. And here I was thinking nobody wanted to play with us any more.
It will be my special pleasure to send you and your men to a watery grave!
We could sorely use the plundered food!
The pirates have plundered all my belongings and taken them to their ships. Defeat the escort ships with their entire crews, and the resources on the convoys will be ours once more.
You can capture resources and food for your soldiers from the pirate convoys sailing the sea.
If you make sure that morale is high, battles will go much better for you.
If you make sure that morale is high, battles will go much better for you.
The fortress is ours, now nothing can stop us from taking back the kingdom!
Two great coastal fortresses stand between me and my rightful kingdom. We must capture at least one of them in order to pass. It is the only way to achieve a lasting victory.
Battle your way to one of the big fortresses, defeat its garrison, and capture it.
The fog is finally beginning to lift!
The route is clear, now let us fight our way to the heart of this fog! Somewhere in there lies the pirates' headquarters, the root of all evil.
Remember to keep raiding convoys to cover your resource costs.

I can't believe my eyes!
An actual kraken, just like in the stories of my ancestors, handed down since time immemorial!
The monster must have destroyed my fleet. Rally your forces for the attack!
You really did it! I had nearly given up hope. This is truly a glorious day!
Destroy this abomination and drive the pirates from here once and for all!
This will be the toughest battle of all. Raise your troops' morale as much as you can!

How could this happen?
My mighty kraken was defeated by a tiny worm!
You may have won the battle, but you have not won the war! I will return and visit revenge upon you and your men, I swear it!

You've defeated the kraken and broken the pirates' power. Soon all of my kingdom will be rid of this plague, and peace will return. I am truly in your debt. May my knights serve you faithfully. Consider them a token of my eternal gratitude. If you like, you can stay a bit longer and help me destroy the last remnants of the pirate vermin.
This mob won't come back anytime soon!
This land was once peaceful. We were completely unprepared for this disaster.
The pirates are as powerful as your halberdiers and longbowmen.
The people of this area owe you their thanks.
We have no time to waste now; we must seize the opportunity and press on!
You can also take all the knights you free here home with you at the end of the event!
The people of this area owe you their thanks.
My people can live here again! Keep going, drive them back further!
Spare yourself many casualties by making sure morale is high.
I can see you are truly a great commander! This loot will be useful.
You've already proven that the darkness can be defeated. Don't hold back now!
Make sure that you're able to feed the troops you liberated. Fight pirate convoys on a regular basis to capture loot.
Time is of the essence! Act quickly before our worst fears come true.
You can decide to capture other islands to free more knights.
The enemy is retreating! This war will soon be won.
The enemy has revealed a weakness in his defense. Seize this chance and strike quickly!
At the end of the event, you can take all of the knights you freed back to your home castle. Deploy them wisely.

You will need better ships in order to venture further into the fog. My fleet is lost, so I can only lend you my master shipbuilders. We will have a mighty navy built in no time. I regret to say that you will need to obtain the necessary resources so you can build the fleet yourself.
The ship has been upgraded, we can continue on our quest to take back my kingdom!
You've captured your first islands, opening the way to deeper waters. Let's upgrade your fleet!
Your fleet's upgrade level determines how far out to sea you can go, and which islands you can reach to attack.
Another successful upgrade! Now we can take back even more islands and plunder more convoys.
Upgrade your fleet to push the fog back further.
Gather the resources you need to upgrade your fleet by plundering pirate convoys and sending resources from home.
Look at it! Doesn't it look magnificent with the new upgrades? Nobody will be able to stop us now!
The fog is getting thicker, and the sea even deeper. You need more reliable ships in these dangerous waters!
Your fleet's upgrade level determines how far out to sea you can go, and which islands you can reach to attack.
The deed is done! Victory is within our grasp. Let's finish this!
Your ships have received quite a battering at sea. Your fleet needs to be especially well-equipped for the final push.
Gather the resources you need to upgrade your fleet by plundering pirate convoys and sending resources from home.

So the landlubber actually wants to stir up trouble?
Hide in your stone houses, or you'll waken a true tempest!

Don't think I'll always be this nice to a freshwater fish that's too far out to sea.
Carry on like that and you're going to make me really angry!

Yes, yes, venture ever deeper into my fog.
You and your crew are facing a cold, wet death.

You asked for it! You have sown the wind, now you shall reap the storm.
Fear the might of my KRAKEN!
Reach the center of the fog

Assign Horatio to your main castle
Get a reward from King Ludwig

I bear dark tidings to your gates. The vile warlord Wolfgard the Flayer is threatening the Empire! You need to rally your troops and assemble mighty generals to defeat him. Meet me at the Generals' Inn. There I will tell you everything you need to know.
Meet Lord Horatio at the Generals' Inn.
Wolfgard will attack your main castle! Open the castle's defense screen and assign Horatio to the defense!
Horatio will now assist in the defense! Go to Wolfgard's castle and taunt the villain!
Wolfgard failed miserably with his attack on your castle. Let's prepare for revenge!
Horatio will now fight with your army. Plan the attack against the Wolfgard's castle!
Victory! Join the celebration in the inn. Select the inn button in the HUD's action panel.
King Ludwig the Round wants to help you find the other generals. Talk to him at the Generals' Inn.
Unlock new skills and assign combat abilities for your generals.
Unlock new skills and assign combat abilities for your generals.
Unlock new skills and assign combat abilities for your generals.
Unlock new skills and assign combat abilities for your generals.
Unlock new skills and assign combat abilities for your generals.
Unlock new skills and assign combat abilities for your generals.
Send me and my fellow generals into battle to get stronger. An experienced general can learn new skills and use unique abilities in battle.

Meet Lord Horatio at the Generals' Inn.
Wolfgard is preparing his attack against your castle. Assign Horatio to your defense to prepare for the battle.
Horatio will now assist your castellan in the upcoming battle. Wolfgard the Flayer can come, we are ready!
Wolfgard failed miserably with his attack on your castle. Let's prepare for revenge!
Horatio will now assist your commander in the upcoming battle. Plan the attack to send Wolfgard back into the shadows.
Victory is ours! Horatio is going to throw one of his epic feasts in the Tavern to celebrate victory over Wolfgard the Flayer.
King Ludwig the Round wants to help you find the other generals. Talk to him at the Generals' Inn.

Upgrades a weapon of pure engineering wonder that will help keep your moat and castle walls secure from the most robust enemy sieges.
Unlocks and upgrades an incredibly practical tool that ensures no enemy castle wall is too high for your melee warriors to overcome.
Unlocks and upgrades a powerful siege engine that reduces the effectiveness of enemy moats and allows your ranged units to rain down death from on high.
Unlocks and upgrades a limb-scatteringly destructive defense cannon that will give your ranged units a boost and enhance the strength of your castle walls.
Unlocks and upgrades a volatile ball of destruction that will mercilessly redistribute the body parts of any melee units foolish enough to cross your castle's moat.
Unlocks and upgrades an explosively destructive weapon that allows your ranged attackers to blast their way through even the staunchest of enemy castle walls.
Unlocks and upgrades a brutally medieval, but incredibly effective device that helps protect your castle walls by turning enemy melee units into pin cushions.
Unlocks and upgrades explosive projectiles that will ensure some of your enemy's ranged forces are killed before they even make it into your courtyard.
Unlocks and upgrades an incendiary ball of destruction that ensures some of your enemy's melee defenders will be killed before the courtyard battle begins.
Unlocks and upgrades a weapon that allows the pyromaniacs in your army to reduce opposing forces to ash when attacking enemy courtyards.
Unlocks and upgrades a pit of flame that will incinerate clumsy enemies and significantly improve your army's defense strength when defending the courtyard.
Unlocks and upgrades a well-fortified military wagon that increases the number of attack waves available to bloodthirsty kings.
Unlocks and upgrades a crude but highly-effective means for protective kings to increase the number of troops that can be placed on their castle walls.
Unlocks and upgrades a boiling pot of death that ensures some of your enemy's ranged attackers will be killed before they even make it into your courtyard.
